remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D5D5|conv.ovf.uconv.ovf.u|将转换为`unsigned native int`(在堆栈上为`native int`) 并在溢出时引发异常。Convert to an `unsigned native int` (on the stack as `native int`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈并且转换从尝试操作。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果发生溢出时，将引发异常。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果转换成功，所得到的值推送到堆栈上。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.u`操作码将转换`value`操作码，然后将转换后的堆栈顶部的值中指定的类型到堆栈顶部。The `conv.ovf.u` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值为太大或太小而无法由目标类型表示，则引发异常。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 从浮点数字转换为整数值将向截断数字零。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`被加载到计算堆栈时会 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或`conv.ovf.u`习惯，这种情况下结果也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果不可以结果类型中表示的结果，引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 以下方法重载可以使用`conv.ovf.u`操作码：The following method overload can use the `conv.ovf.u` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |BABA|conv.ovf.u8conv.ovf.u8|将转换为`unsigned int64`(在堆栈上为`int64`) 并在溢出时引发异常。Convert to an `unsigned int64` (on the stack as `int64`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈并且转换从尝试操作。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果发生溢出时，将引发异常。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果转换成功，所得到的值推送到堆栈上。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.u8`操作码将转换`value`操作码，然后将转换后的堆栈顶部的值中指定的类型到堆栈顶部。The `conv.ovf.u8` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值为太大或太小而无法由目标类型表示，则引发异常。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 从浮点数字转换为整数值将向截断数字零。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`被加载到计算堆栈时会 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或`conv.ovf.u`习惯，这种情况下结果也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果不可以结果类型中表示的结果，引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 以下方法重载可以使用`conv.ovf.u8`操作码：The following method overload can use the `conv.ovf.u8` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to , throwing on overflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8989|conv.ovf.u8.unconv.ovf.u8.un|将转换为无符号的值`unsigned int64`(在堆栈上为`int64`) 并在溢出时引发异常。Converts an unsigned value to an `unsigned int64` (on the stack as `int64`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈并且转换从尝试操作。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果发生溢出时，将引发异常。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果转换成功，所得到的值推送到堆栈上。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.u8.un`操作码将转换`value`操作码，然后将转换后的堆栈顶部的值中指定的类型到堆栈顶部。The `conv.ovf.u8.un` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值为太大或太小而无法由目标类型表示，则引发异常。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 从浮点数字转换为整数值将向截断数字零。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`被加载到计算堆栈时会 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或`conv.ovf.u`习惯，这种情况下结果也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果不可以结果类型中表示的结果，引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 以下方法重载可以使用`conv.ovf.u8.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `conv.ovf.u8.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将位于计算堆栈顶部的无符号整数值转换为 。

span.span: Converts the unsigned integer value on top of the evaluation stack to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7676|conv.r.unconv.r.un|转换无符号的整数到浮点、 推送`F`堆栈上。Convert unsigned integer to floating-point, pushing `F` on stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈并且转换从尝试操作。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 3. 如果转换成功，所得到的值推送到堆栈上。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.r.un`操作码将转换`value`操作码，然后将的转换后的堆栈顶部的值中指定的类型到堆栈顶部。The `conv.r.un` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack. 小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`被加载到计算堆栈时会 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用时，结果在这种情况下也是`native int`)。Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 浮点值转换为`F`类型。Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type. 从浮点数字转换为整数值将向截断数字零。Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero. 从转换时`float64`到`float32`，精度可能会丢失。When converting from a `float64` to a `float32`, precision can be lost. 如果`value`太大而无法放入`float32 (F)`，正无穷大 (如果`value`为正) 或负无穷大 (如果`value`为负) 返回。If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned. 转换到另一个的一个整数类型发生溢出时，是否将被截断高序位字节。If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated. 如果结果为小于`int32`，值进行符号扩展以填充槽。If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot. 如果发生溢出时将浮点类型转换为整数`result`返回未指定。If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the `result` returned is unspecified. `conv.r.un`操作将从堆栈的一个整数，将其解释为无符号整数，并将替换要表示的浮点数： 任一`float32`，如果这是宽度不足以表示而不会丢失精度，整数或其他`float64`。The `conv.r.un` operation takes an integer off the stack, interprets it as unsigned, and replaces it with a floating-point number to represent the integer: either a `float32`, if this is wide enough to represent the integer without loss of precision, or else a `float64`. 时使用此字段不会引发任何异常。No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field. 以下方法重载可以使用`conv.r.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `conv.r.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6B6B|conv.r4conv.r4|将转换为`float32`、 推送`F`堆栈上。Convert to `float32`, pushing `F` on stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈并且转换从尝试操作。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 3. 如果转换成功，所得到的值推送到堆栈上。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.r4`操作码将转换`value`操作码，然后将的转换后的堆栈顶部的值中指定的类型到堆栈顶部。The `conv.r4` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack. 小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`被加载到计算堆栈时会 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用时，结果在这种情况下也是`native int`)。Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 浮点值转换为`F`类型。Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type. 从浮点数字转换为整数值将向截断数字零。Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero. 从转换时`float64`到`float32`，精度可能会丢失。When converting from an `float64` to an `float32`, precision can be lost. 如果`value`太大而无法放入`float32 (F)`，正无穷大 (如果`value`为正) 或负无穷大 (如果`value`为负) 返回。If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned. 转换到另一个的一个整数类型发生溢出时，是否将被截断高序位字节。If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated. 如果结果为小于`int32`，值进行符号扩展以填充槽。If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot. 发生溢出时是否将浮点类型转换为整数，则返回该值未指定。If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified. 时使用此字段不会引发任何异常。No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field. 以下方法重载可以使用`conv.r4`操作码：The following method overload can use the `conv.r4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D1D1|conv.u2conv.u2|将转换为`int16`、 推送`int32`堆栈上。Convert to `int16`, pushing `int32` on stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈并且转换从尝试操作。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 3. 如果转换成功，所得到的值推送到堆栈上。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.u2`操作码将转换`value`操作码，然后将的转换后的堆栈顶部的值中指定的类型到堆栈顶部。The `conv.u2` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack. 小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`被加载到计算堆栈时会 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用时，结果在这种情况下也是`native int`)。Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 浮点值转换为`F`类型。Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type. 从浮点数字转换为整数值将向截断数字零。Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero. 从转换时`float64`到`float32`，精度可能会丢失。When converting from an `float64` to an `float32`, precision can be lost. 如果`value`太大而无法放入`float32 (F)`，正无穷大 (如果`value`为正) 或负无穷大 (如果`value`为负) 返回。If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned. 转换到另一个的一个整数类型发生溢出时，是否将被截断高序位字节。If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated. 如果结果为小于`int32`，值进行符号扩展以填充槽。If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot. 发生溢出时是否将浮点类型转换为整数，则返回该值未指定。If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified. 时使用此字段不会引发任何异常。No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field. 请参阅和以等效的结果类型不正确表示的结果值时，将引发异常的说明。See and for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value. 以下方法重载可以使用`conv.u2`操作码：The following method overload can use the `conv.u2` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将指定数目的字节从源地址复制到目标地址。

span.span: Copies a specified number bytes from a source address to a destination address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 17FE 17|cpblkcpblk|将数据从一个内存块复制到另一个。Copy data from one memory block to another.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 目标地址推送到堆栈上。The destination address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 源地址推送到堆栈上。The source address is pushed onto the stack. 3. 要复制的字节数被推送到堆栈上。The number of bytes to copy is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈; 中弹出的字节数、 源地址和目标地址数指定的数目的字节从源地址复制到目标地址。The number of bytes, the source address, and the destination address are popped from the stack; the specified number of bytes are copied from the source address to the destination address. `cpblk`指令将复制大量 (类型`unsigned int32`) 的字节从源地址 (类型的`*`， `native int`，或`&`) 到目标地址 (类型的`*`， `native int`，或`&`)。The `cpblk` instruction copies a number (type `unsigned int32`) of bytes from a source address (of type `*`, `native int`, or `&`) to a destination address (of type `*`, `native int`, or `&`). 行为`cpblk`未指定，如果源和目标区域重叠。The behavior of `cpblk` is unspecified if the source and destination areas overlap. `cpblk` 假定的源和目标解决的对齐到自然机的大小。`cpblk` assumes that both the source and destination addressed are aligned to the natural size of the machine. `cpblk`指令可以立即前面是`unaligned.`指令以指示源或目标不对齐。The `cpblk` instruction can be immediately preceded by the `unaligned.` instruction to indicate that either the source or the destination is unaligned. 该操作的`cpblk`指令可更改紧跟其后或前缀指令。The operation of the `cpblk` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果检测到无效的地址，可能会引发。 may be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 以下方法重载可以使用`cpblk`操作码：The following method overload can use the `cpblk` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将位于对象（、 或 类型）地址的值类型复制到目标对象（、 或 类型）的地址。

span.span: Copies the value type located at the address of an object (type , or ) to the address of the destination object (type , or ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |70 < `T` >70 < `T` >|cpobj `classTok`cpobj `classTok`|将值类型从的源对象到的目标对象。Copies a value type from a source object to a destination object.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 目标对象引用推送到堆栈上。The destination object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 源对象引用推送到堆栈上。The source object reference is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出的两个对象引用源对象地址处的值类型复制到目标对象的地址。The two object references are popped from the stack; the value type at the address of the source object is copied to the address of the destination object. 行为`cpobj`如果源和目标对象的引用都不是指向类标记所表示的类的实例是未指定`classTok`(`typeref`或`typedef`)，或者如果`classTok`不表示值类型。The behavior of `cpobj` is unspecified if the source and destination object references are not pointers to instances of the class represented by the class token `classTok` (a `typeref` or `typedef`), or if `classTok` does not represent a value type. 如果检测到无效的地址，可能会引发。 may be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 以下方法重载可以使用`cpobj`操作码：The following method overload can use the `cpobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 将两个值相除并将结果作为浮点（ 类型）或商（ 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Divides two values and pushes the result as a floating-point (type ) or quotient (type ) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5B5B|divdiv|将两个值以返回商或浮点结果。Divides two values to return a quotient or floating-point result.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`除以`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is divided by `value2`. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `result` = `value1` div value2 满足以下条件：`result` = `value1` div value2 satisfies the following conditions: |`result` | = | `value1` | / | `value2` |，和：| `result` | = | `value1` | / | `value2` |, and: 登录 (`result`) = +，如果登录 (`value1`) = 号 (`value2`)，或-，如果登录 (`value1`) ~ = 号 (`value2`)sign(`result`) = +, if sign(`value1`) = sign(`value2`), or -, if sign(`value1`) ~= sign(`value2`) `div`指令计算结果并将结果推送到堆栈上。The `div` instruction computes the result and pushes it on the stack. 整数除法向零截断。Integer division truncates towards zero. 被零的有限数量的除法产生的正确签名的无限值。Division of a finite number by zero produces the correctly signed infinite value. 除以零的零个或无穷大除以无穷大生成 NaN （非数字） 值。Dividing zero by zero or infinity by infinity produces the NaN (Not-A-Number) value. 任何数字除以无穷大将生成零值。Any number divided by infinity will produce a zero value. 整数运算引发如果结果不能表示该结果类型中。Integral operations throw if the result cannot be represented in the result type. 可能的原因是`value1`是最大负数的值，和`value2`为-1。This can happen if `value1` is the maximum negative value, and `value2` is -1. 整数运算引发如果`value2`为零。Integral operations throw if `value2` is zero. 请注意，在基于 Intel 的平台上计算 (minint div-1) 时引发。Note that on Intel-based platforms an is thrown when computing (minint div -1). 浮点运算永远不会引发的异常 （它们产生 Nan 或无穷大相反）。Floating-point operations never throw an exception (they produce NaNs or infinities instead). 以下方法重载可以使用`div`操作码：The following method overload can use the `div` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 两个无符号整数值相除并将结果 ( ) 推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Divides two unsigned integer values and pushes the result () onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5C5C|div.undiv.un|两个值，未签名，返回商相除。Divides two values, unsigned, returning a quotient.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`除以`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is divided by `value2`. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `div.un`指令计算`value1`除以`value2`，同时作为无符号的整数和推送`result`堆栈上。The `div.un` instruction computes `value1` divided by `value2`, both taken as unsigned integers, and pushes the `result` on the stack. 以下方法重载可以使用`div.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `div.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 复制计算堆栈上当前最顶端的值，然后将副本推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Copies the current topmost value on the evaluation stack, and then pushes the copy onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2525|dupdup|重复堆栈顶部的值。Duplicates the value on the top of the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 从重复堆栈中弹出。`value` is popped off of the stack for duplication. 3. `value` 为推送回到堆栈上。`value` is pushed back onto the stack. 4. 重复的值推送到堆栈上。A duplicate value is pushed onto the stack. `dup`指令重复堆栈的顶部元素并将留之上打开它的两个相同的值。The `dup` instruction duplicates the top element of the stack, and leaves two identical values atop it. 以下方法重载可以使用`dup`操作码：The following method overload can use the `dup` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Endfilter As OpCode
public: static initonly System::Reflection::Emit::OpCode Endfilter;

summary.span: 将控制从异常的 子句转移回公共语言结构 (CLI) 异常处理程序。

span.span: Transfers control from the clause of an exception back to the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) exception handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 11FE 11|endfilterendfilter|最终的 SEH 异常处理筛选器子句。End filter clause of SEH exception handling.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 从堆栈中弹出`endfilter`执行并将控制权转交给异常处理程序。`value` is popped from the stack; `endfilter` is executed and control is transferred to the exception handler. `Value` (其中的类型必须为`int32`并且是一组特定的值) 从筛选器子句返回。`Value` (which must be of type `int32` and is one of a specific set of values) is returned from the filter clause. 它应该是之一：It should be one of: - `exception_continue_search` (`value` = 0) 表示不继续搜索的异常处理程序`exception_continue_search` (`value` = 0) to continue searching for an exception handler - `exception_execute_handler` (`value` = 1) 启动第二个阶段的异常处理在其上最后块运行直到该处理程序与此筛选器子句是所在。`exception_execute_handler` (`value` = 1) to start the second phase of exception handling where finally blocks are run until the handler associated with this filter clause is located. 在发现后，执行处理程序。Upon discovery, the handler is executed. 其他整数值将产生未指定的结果。Other integer values will produce unspecified results. 方法的异常表中所示的入口点的筛选器，必须为筛选器的代码块中的第一个指令。The entry point of a filter, as shown in the method's exception table, must be the first instruction in the filter's code block. `endfilter`指令必须为筛选器的代码块中的最后一个指令 (因此只能有一个`endfilter`任何单个筛选器块)。The `endfilter` instruction must be the last instruction in the filter's code block (hence there can only be one `endfilter` for any single filter block). 执行后`endfilter`控件的指令，逻辑上流动回 CLI 异常处理机制。After executing the `endfilter` instruction, control logically flows back to the CLI exception handling mechanism. 无法将控制转移到一个筛选器块除外通过异常机制。Control cannot be transferred into a filter block except through the exception mechanism. 无法将控制转移注销除非使用`throw`指令或通过执行最终`endfilter`指令。Control cannot be transferred out of a filter block except through the use of a `throw` instruction or by executing the final `endfilter` instruction. 不能嵌入`try`中块`filter`块。You cannot embed a `try` block within a `filter` block. 如果在引发异常`filter`块，截获和值为 0 (`exception_continue_search`) 返回。If an exception is thrown inside the `filter` block, it is intercepted and a value of 0 (`exception_continue_search`) is returned. 以下方法重载可以使用`endfilter`操作码：The following method overload can use the `endfilter` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将控制从异常块的 或 子句转移回公共语言结构 (CLI) 异常处理程序。

span.span: Transfers control from the or clause of an exception block back to the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) exception handler.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DCDC|endfinallyendfinally

同样endfault|结束`finally`或`fault`子句的异常块。Ends the `finally` or `fault` clause of an exception block.| 没有堆栈转换为此指令的行为。There are no stack transition behaviors for this instruction. `Endfinally` 和`endfault`表示的结尾`finally`或`fault`子句，以便该堆栈展开可以继续，直到调用异常处理程序。`Endfinally` and `endfault` signal the end of the `finally` or `fault` clause so that stack unwinding can continue until the exception handler is invoked. `endfinally`或`endfault`指令将控制转移回 CLI 异常机制。The `endfinally` or `endfault` instruction transfers control back to the CLI exception mechanism. 然后，此机制下一个搜索`finally`链如果受保护的块已退出，leave 指令中的子句。The mechanism then searches for the next `finally` clause in the chain if the protected block was exited with a leave instruction. 如果退出受保护的块的异常，下一步将搜索 CLI`finally`或`fault`，或输入异常处理的第一个过程期间选择的异常处理程序。If the protected block was exited with an exception, the CLI will search for the next `finally` or `fault`, or enter the exception handler chosen during the first pass of exception handling. `endfinally`指令可能仅显示在词法上`finally`块。An `endfinally` instruction might only appear lexically within a `finally` block. 与不同`endfilter`指令，块的末尾不要求`endfinally`指令，并且有多个`endfinally`所需的块中的说明。Unlike the `endfilter` instruction, there is no requirement that the block end with an `endfinally` instruction, and there can be as many `endfinally` instructions within the block as required. 这些相同的限制适用于`endfault`指令和`fault`块。These same restrictions apply to the `endfault` instruction and the `fault` block. 无法将控制转移到`finally`(或`fault`) 通过异常机制阻止除外。Control cannot be transferred into a `finally` (or `fault`) block except through the exception mechanism. 无法将控制转移外`finally`(或`fault`) 使用阻止除`throw`指令或执行`endfinally`(或`endfault`) 指令。Control cannot be transferred out of a `finally` (or `fault`) block except through the use of a `throw` instruction or executing the `endfinally` (or `endfault`) instruction. 具体而言，你不能"掉"的`finally`(或`fault`) 块或执行或中的指令`finally`(或`fault`) 块。In particular, you cannot "fall out" of a `finally` (or `fault`) block or to execute a or instruction within a `finally` (or `fault`) block. 请注意，`endfault`和`endfinally`说明是别名，即它们对应于相同的操作码。Note that the `endfault` and `endfinally` instructions are aliases - they correspond to the same opcode. 以下方法重载可以使用`endfinally`(`endfault`) 操作码，以及`ILGenerator`方法。The following method overload can use the `endfinally` (`endfault`) opcode, as well as the `ILGenerator` method . - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode) - ILGenerator.EndExceptionBlock()ILGenerator.EndExceptionBlock()

summary.span: 将位于特定地址的内存的指定块初始化为给定大小和初始值。

span.span: Initializes a specified block of memory at a specific address to a given size and initial value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 18FE 18|紧接initblk|在为给定值的内存块中设置的每个位置。Set each location in a block of memory to a given value.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 起始地址推送到堆栈上。A starting address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 初始化值推送到堆栈上。An initialization value is pushed onto the stack. 3. 要初始化的字节数被推送到堆栈上。The number of bytes to initialize is pushed onto the stack. 4. 中的字节数、 初始化值和的起始地址数弹出从堆栈，并按它们的值执行初始化。The number of bytes, the initialization value, and the starting address are popped from the stack, and the initialization is performed as per their values. `initblk`指令设置数 (`unsigned int32`) 的字节从指定地址开始 (类型的`native int`， `&`，或`*`) 到初始化值 (类型的`unsigned int8`)。The `initblk` instruction sets the number (`unsigned int32`) of bytes starting at the specified address (of type `native int`, `&`, or `*`) to the initialization value (of type `unsigned int8`). `initblk` 假定的起始地址对齐到自然机的大小。`initblk` assumes that the starting address is aligned to the natural size of the machine. 该操作的`initblk`说明可更改紧跟其后或前缀指令。The operation of the `initblk` instructions can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果检测到无效的地址，可能会引发。 may be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 以下方法重载可以使用`initblk`操作码：The following method overload can use the `initblk` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将位于指定地址的值类型的每个字段初始化为空引用或适当的基元类型的 0。

span.span: Initializes each field of the value type at a specified address to a null reference or a 0 of the appropriate primitive type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 15 < `T` >FE 15 < `T` >|`initobj` `typeTok``initobj` `typeTok`|初始化值类型。Initializes a value type.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 要初始化的值类型的地址推送到堆栈上。The address of the value type to initialize is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出地址指定地址处的值类型被初始化为类型`typeTok`。The address is popped from the stack; the value type at the specified address is initialized as type `typeTok`. `initobj`指令初始化每个字段的推送的地址由指定的值类型 (类型的`native int`， `&`，或`*`) 为空引用或适当的基元类型的 0。The `initobj` instruction initializes each field of the value type specified by the pushed address (of type `native int`, `&`, or `*`) to a null reference or a 0 of the appropriate primitive type. 调用此方法后，该实例可调用的构造函数方法。After this method is called, the instance is ready for a constructor method to be called. 如果`typeTok`是引用类型，此指令具有相同的效果`ldnull`跟`stind.ref`。If `typeTok` is a reference type, this instruction has the same effect as `ldnull` followed by `stind.ref`. 与不同，`initobj`不调用构造函数方法。Unlike , `initobj` does not call the constructor method. `Initobj` 是用于初始化值类型，而`newobj`用于分配和初始化对象。`Initobj` is intended for initializing value types, while `newobj` is used to allocate and initialize objects. 以下方法重载可以使用`initobj`操作码：The following method overload can use the `initobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 测试对象引用（ 类型）是否为特定类的实例。

span.span: Tests whether an object reference (type ) is an instance of a particular class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |75 < `T` >75 < `T` >|isinst `class`isinst `class`|测试一个对象引用的实例是否`class`、 返回空引用或该类的实例或接口。Tests if an object reference is an instance of `class`, returning either a null reference or an instance of that class or interface.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用推送到堆栈上。An object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出记录并将对象引用进行测试以查看它是否传递中的类的实例`class`。The object reference is popped from the stack and tested to see if it is an instance of the class passed in `class`. 3. （一个对象引用或空引用） 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result (either an object reference or a null reference) is pushed onto the stack. `Class` 元数据标记指示所需的类。`Class` is a metadata token indicating the desired class. 如果在堆栈顶层对象的类实现`class`(如果`class`是一个接口) 或作为派生的类的`class`(如果`class`是正则类) 则它被转换为类型`class`并将结果推送到堆栈上，完全像已调用一样。If the class of the object on the top of the stack implements `class` (if `class` is an interface) or is a derived class of `class` (if `class` is a regular class) then it is cast to type `class` and the result is pushed on the stack, exactly as though had been called. 否则为空引用推送到堆栈上。Otherwise, a null reference is pushed on the stack. 如果对象引用本身为空引用，然后`isinst`同样返回空引用。If the object reference itself is a null reference, then `isinst` likewise returns a null reference. 如果找不到类将引发。 is thrown if class cannot be found. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码而不是在运行时，通常是检测到此问题。This is typically detected when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at runtime. 以下方法重载可以使用`isinst`操作码：The following method overload can use the `isinst` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 退出当前方法并跳至指定方法。

span.span: Exits current method and jumps to specified method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |27 < `T` >27 < `T` >|jmp `method`jmp `method`|退出当前方法并跳转到指定的方法。Exit current method and jump to specified method.| 没有堆栈转换为此指令的行为。There are no stack transition behaviors for this instruction. `jmp` （跳转） 指令将控制转移到指定的方法`method`，即方法引用的元数据标记。The `jmp` (jump) instruction transfers control to the method specified by `method`, which is a metadata token for a method reference. 当前的自变量将传输到目标方法。The current arguments are transferred to the destination method. 在执行此指令时，计算堆栈必须为空。The evaluation stack must be empty when this instruction is executed. 调用约定、 数和在目标地址的自变量的类型必须与匹配的当前方法。The calling convention, number and type of arguments at the destination address must match that of the current method. `jmp`指令不能用于将控制转移出`try`， `filter`， `catch`，或`finally`块。The `jmp` instruction cannot be used to transferred control out of a `try`, `filter`, `catch`, or `finally` block. 以下方法重载可以使用`jmp`操作码：The following method overload can use the `jmp` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)

summary.span: 将自变量（由指定索引值引用）加载到堆栈上。

span.span: Loads an argument (referenced by a specified index value) onto the stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 09 < `unsigned int16` >FE 09 < `unsigned int16` >|ldarg `index`ldarg `index`|处的参数加载`index`到堆栈上。Load argument at `index` onto stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 参数值`index`推送到堆栈上。The argument value at `index` is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg`指令将索引为的参数`index`、 参数进行索引从 0 开始，到计算堆栈。The `ldarg` instruction pushes the argument indexed at `index`, where arguments are indexed from 0 onwards, onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg`指令可以用于通过将其复制从传入的参数加载值类型或基元值到堆栈上的。The `ldarg` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 自变量值的类型是参数的作为当前方法的签名指定的类型相同。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 对于采用可变长度参数列表中，过程`ldarg`指令可以仅用于初始固定自变量，不是那些在签名的变量的一部分 (请参阅更多详细信息的指令)。For procedures that take a variable-length argument list, the `ldarg` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature (see the instruction for more details). 保存的整数值小于 4 个字节长的自变量进行扩展以键入`int32`被加载到堆栈时会。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮点值扩展为其本机的大小 (类型`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldarg`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldarg` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

summary.span: 将索引为 0 的参数加载到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Loads the argument at index 0 onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0202|ldarg.0ldarg.0|将参数 0 到堆栈上加载Load argument 0 onto stack| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 索引 0 处的参数值推送到堆栈上。The argument value at index 0 is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg.0`指令是用于加载位于索引 0 处的参数值的有效编码。The `ldarg.0` instruction is an efficient encoding for loading the argument value at index 0. `ldarg.0`指令将索引为 0 到计算堆栈的参数。The `ldarg.0` instruction pushes the argument indexed at 0 onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg.0`指令可以用于通过将其复制从传入的参数加载值类型或基元值到堆栈上的。The `ldarg.0` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 自变量值的类型是参数的作为当前方法的签名指定的类型相同。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 保存的整数值小于 4 个字节长的自变量进行扩展以键入`int32`被加载到堆栈时会。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮点值扩展为其本机的大小 (类型`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldarg.0`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldarg.0` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0303|ldarg.1ldarg.1|加载到堆栈的参数 1。Load argument 1 onto stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 索引 1 处的参数值推送到堆栈上。The argument value at index 1 is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg.1`指令是用于加载索引 1 处的参数值的有效编码。The `ldarg.1` instruction is an efficient encoding for loading the argument value at index 1. `ldarg.1`指令将索引为 1 到计算堆栈的参数。The `ldarg.1` instruction pushes the argument indexed at 1 onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg.1`指令可以用于通过将其复制从传入的参数加载值类型或基元值到堆栈上的。The `ldarg.1` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 自变量值的类型是参数的作为当前方法的签名指定的类型相同。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 保存的整数值小于 4 个字节长的自变量进行扩展以键入`int32`被加载到堆栈时会。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮点值扩展为其本机的大小 (类型`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldarg.1`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldarg.1` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将索引为 2 的自变量加载到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Loads the argument at index 2 onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0404|ldarg.2ldarg.2|加载到堆栈的参数 2。Load argument 2 onto stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 索引 2 处的参数值推送到堆栈上。The argument value at index 2 is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg.2`指令是用于加载索引 2 处的参数值的有效编码。The `ldarg.2` instruction is an efficient encoding for loading the argument value at index 2. `ldarg.2`指令将索引为 2 到计算堆栈的参数。The `ldarg.2` instruction pushes the argument indexed at 2 onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg.2`指令可以用于通过将其复制从传入的参数加载值类型或基元值到堆栈上的。The `ldarg.2` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 自变量值的类型是参数的作为当前方法的签名指定的类型相同。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 保存的整数值小于 4 个字节长的自变量进行扩展以键入`int32`被加载到堆栈时会。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮点值扩展为其本机的大小 (类型`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldarg.2`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldarg.2` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Loads the argument at index 3 onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0505|ldarg.3ldarg.3|加载到堆栈的参数 3。Load argument 3 onto stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 索引 3 处的参数值推送到堆栈上。The argument value at index 3 is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg.3`指令是用于加载索引 3 处的参数值的有效编码。The `ldarg.3` instruction is an efficient encoding for loading the argument value at index 3. `ldarg.3`指令将索引为 3 到计算堆栈的参数。The `ldarg.3` instruction pushes the argument indexed at 3 onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg.3`指令可以用于通过将其复制从传入的参数加载值类型或基元值到堆栈上的。The `ldarg.3` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 自变量值的类型是参数的作为当前方法的签名指定的类型相同。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 保存的整数值小于 4 个字节长的自变量进行扩展以键入`int32`被加载到堆栈时会。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮点值扩展为其本机的大小 (类型`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldarg.3`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldarg.3` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将参数（由指定的短格式索引引用）加载到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Loads the argument (referenced by a specified short form index) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0E < `unsigned int8` >0E < `unsigned int8` >|ldarg.s `index`ldarg.s `index`|处的参数加载`index`到堆栈，缩写形式。Load argument at `index` onto stack, short form.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 参数值`index`推送到堆栈上。The argument value at `index` is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg.s`指令是有效编码，为加载参数索引为从 4 到 255 之间。The `ldarg.s` instruction is an efficient encoding for loading arguments indexed from 4 through 255. `ldarg.s`指令将索引为的参数`index`、 参数进行索引从 0 开始，到计算堆栈。The `ldarg.s` instruction pushes the argument indexed at `index`, where arguments are indexed from 0 onwards, onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg.s`指令可以用于通过将其复制从传入的参数加载值类型或基元值到堆栈上的。The `ldarg.s` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 自变量值的类型是参数的作为当前方法的签名指定的类型相同。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 对于采用可变长度参数列表中，过程`ldarg.s`指令可以仅用于初始固定自变量，不是那些在签名的变量的一部分 (请参阅更多详细信息的指令)。For procedures that take a variable-length argument list, the `ldarg.s` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature (see the instruction for more details). 保存的整数值小于 4 个字节长的自变量进行扩展以键入`int32`被加载到堆栈时会。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮点值扩展为其本机的大小 (类型`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldarg.s`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldarg.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，字节）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)

summary.span: 将自变量地址加载到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Load an argument address onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0A < `unsigned int16` >FE 0A < `unsigned int16` >|ldarga `index`ldarga `index`|提取的参数按建立索引的地址`index`。Fetch the address of argument indexed by `index`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 地址`addr`按建立索引的自变量的`index`推送到堆栈上。The address `addr` of the argument indexed by `index` is pushed onto the stack. `ldarga`指令获取地址 (类型的`*`) 按建立索引的自变量的`index`、 自变量从 0 开始的索引位置。The `ldarga` instruction fetches the address (of type `*`) of the argument indexed by `index`, where arguments are indexed from 0 onwards. 地址`addr`始终对齐到自然边界在目标计算机上。The address `addr` is always aligned to a natural boundary on the target machine. 对于采用可变长度参数列表中，过程`ldarga`指令可以仅用于初始固定自变量，不是那些在签名的变量的一部分。For procedures that take a variable-length argument list, the `ldarga` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. `ldarga` 用于通过 ref 参数传递。`ldarga` is used for by-ref parameter passing. 对于其他情况，和应使用。For other cases, and should be used. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldarga`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldarga` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

summary.span: 以短格式将参数地址加载到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Load an argument address, in short form, onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0F < `unsigned int8` >0F < `unsigned int8` >|变 `index`ldarga.s `index`|提取的参数按建立索引的地址`index`，缩写形式。Fetch the address of argument indexed by `index`, short form.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 地址`addr`按建立索引的自变量的`index`推送到堆栈上。The address `addr` of the argument indexed by `index` is pushed onto the stack. `ldarga.s` (的缩写形式`ldarga`) 应该用于自变量数字 0 到 255，并且更有效的编码。`ldarga.s` (the short form of `ldarga`) should be used for argument numbers 0 through 255, and is a more efficient encoding. `ldarga.s`指令获取地址 (类型的`*`) 按建立索引的自变量的`index`、 自变量从 0 开始的索引位置。The `ldarga.s` instruction fetches the address (of type`*`) of the argument indexed by `index`, where arguments are indexed from 0 onwards. 地址`addr`始终对齐到自然边界在目标计算机上。The address `addr` is always aligned to a natural boundary on the target machine. 对于采用可变长度参数列表中，过程`ldarga.s`指令可以仅用于初始固定自变量，不是那些在签名的变量的一部分。For procedures that take a variable-length argument list, the `ldarga.s` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. `ldarga.s` 用于通过 ref 参数传递。`ldarga.s` is used for by-ref parameter passing. 对于其他情况，和应使用。For other cases, and should be used. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldarga.s`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldarga.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，字节）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)

summary.span: 将所提供的 类型的值作为 推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes a supplied value of type onto the evaluation stack as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |20 < `int32` >20 < `int32` >|ldc.i4 `num`ldc.i4 `num`|将值推送`num`到堆栈上。Pushes the value `num` onto the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值`num`推送到堆栈上。The value `num` is pushed onto the stack. 请注意，有特殊短 （并因此更有效） 编码为整数-128 到 127，和尤其是短编码为-1 到 8。Note that there are special short (and hence more efficient) encodings for the integers -128 through 127, and especially short encodings for -1 through 8. 所有短编码推送到堆栈上的 4 字节整数。All short encodings push 4 byte integers on the stack. 较长的编码将用于 8 字节整数和 4 到 8 字节浮点数，以及不适合在短窗体中的 4 字节值。Longer encodings are used for 8 byte integers and 4 and 8 byte floating-point numbers, as well as 4-byte values that do not fit in the short forms. 有三种方法，以将推送到堆栈上的 8 字节整数常量There are three ways to push an 8 byte integer constant onto the stack 1. 使用指令必须以多个 32 位为单位表示的常量。Use the instruction for constants that must be expressed in more than 32 bits. 2. 使用指令跟需要 9 到 32 位的常量。Use the instruction followed by a for constants that require 9 to 32 bits. 3. 使用短格式指令跟可以以 8 或更少位为单位表示的常量。Use a short form instruction followed by a for constants that can be expressed in 8 or fewer bits. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldc.i4`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldc.i4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，int）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, int)

summary.span: 按照指令中指定的类型，将指定数组索引中的元素加载到计算堆栈的顶部。

span.span: Loads the element at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as the type specified in the instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A3 < `T` >A3 < `T` >|ldelem `typeTok`ldelem `typeTok`|加载处的元素`index`到作为类型堆栈的顶部`typeTok`。Loads the element at `index` onto the top of the stack as type `typeTok`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用`array`推送到堆栈上。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送到堆栈上。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 和`array`从堆栈中弹出位置存储的值`index`中`array`查找。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the value stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 将值推送到堆栈中。The value is pushed onto the stack. `ldelem`指令加载具有索引的元素的值`index`(类型`native int`) 中的从零开始的一维数组`array`并将其放在堆栈顶层。The `ldelem` instruction loads the value of the element with index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 数组是对象，并因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects, and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 返回值的类型指定标记`typeTok`在指令中。The type of the return value is specified by the token `typeTok` in the instruction. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于上限`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the upper bound of `array`. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldelem`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldelem` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 将位于指定数组索引处的 类型的元素作为 加载到计算堆栈的顶部。

span.span: Loads the element with type at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9797|ldelem.ildelem.i|类型加载元素`native int`在`index`到作为堆栈的顶部`native int`。Loads the element with type `native int` at `index` onto the top of the stack as a `native int`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用`array`推送到堆栈上。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送到堆栈上。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 和`array`从堆栈中弹出位置存储的值`index`中`array`查找。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the value stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 将值推送到堆栈中。The value is pushed onto the stack. `ldelem.i`指令加载具有索引的元素的值`index`(类型`native int`) 中的从零开始的一维数组`array`并将其放在堆栈顶层。The `ldelem.i` instruction loads the value of the element with index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 返回值`ldelem.i`是`native int`。The return value for `ldelem.i` is `native int`. 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`(不`native int`) 时，它们是加载到计算堆栈上。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于的边界`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldelem.i`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldelem.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9494|ldelem.i4ldelem.i4|类型加载元素`int32`在`index`到作为堆栈的顶部`int32`。Loads the element with type `int32` at `index` onto the top of the stack as an `int32`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用`array`推送到堆栈上。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送到堆栈上。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 和`array`从堆栈中弹出位置存储的值`index`中`array`查找。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the value stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 将值推送到堆栈中。The value is pushed onto the stack. `ldelem.i4`指令加载具有索引的元素的值`index`(类型`native int`) 中的从零开始的一维数组`array`并将其放在堆栈顶层。The `ldelem.i4` instruction loads the value of the element with index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 返回值`ldelem.i4`是`int32`。The return value for `ldelem.i4` is `int32`. 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`(不`native int`) 时，它们是加载到计算堆栈上。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于的边界`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldelem.i4`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldelem.i4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9696|ldelem.i8ldelem.i8|类型加载元素`int64`在`index`到作为堆栈的顶部`int64`。Loads the element with type `int64` at `index` onto the top of the stack as an `int64`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用`array`推送到堆栈上。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送到堆栈上。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 和`array`从堆栈中弹出位置存储的值`index`中`array`查找。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the value stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 将值推送到堆栈中。The value is pushed onto the stack. `ldelem.i8`指令加载具有索引的元素的值`index`(类型`native int`) 中的从零开始的一维数组`array`并将其放在堆栈顶层。The `ldelem.i8` instruction loads the value of the element with index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 返回值`ldelem.i8`是`int64`。The return value for `ldelem.i8` is `int64`. 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`(不`native int`) 时，它们是加载到计算堆栈上。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于的边界`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldelem.i8`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldelem.i8` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将位于指定数组索引处的 类型的元素作为 类型（浮点型）加载到计算堆栈的顶部。

span.span: Loads the element with type at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as type (float).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9898|ldelem.r4ldelem.r4|类型加载元素`float32`在`index`到堆栈上为一种类型的顶部`F`。Loads the element with type `float32` at `index` onto the top of the stack as a type `F`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用`array`推送到堆栈上。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送到堆栈上。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 和`array`从堆栈中弹出位置存储的值`index`中`array`查找。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the value stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 将值推送到堆栈中。The value is pushed onto the stack. `ldelem.r4`指令加载具有索引的元素的值`index`(类型`native int`) 中的从零开始的一维数组`array`并将其放在堆栈顶层。The `ldelem.r4` instruction loads the value of the element with index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 返回值`ldelem.r4`是`float32`。The return value for `ldelem.r4` is `float32`. 浮点值转换为类型`F`时加载到计算堆栈上。Floating-point values are converted to type `F` when loaded onto the evaluation stack. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于的边界`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldelem.r4`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldelem.r4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Loads the address of the array element at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as type (managed pointer).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8F < `T` >8F < `T` >|ldelema `class`ldelema `class`|处的数组元素的地址加载`index`到作为类型计算堆栈的顶部`&`（托管的指针）。Loads the address of the array element at `index` onto the top of the evaluation stack as type `&` (managed pointer).| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用`array`推送到堆栈上。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送到堆栈上。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 和`array`从堆栈中弹出存储位置的地址`index`中`array`查找。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the address stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 地址推送到堆栈中。The address is pushed onto the stack. `ldelema`用于检索对象的数组中的特定索引处的对象的地址 (类型的`class`)。The `ldelema` is used to retrieve the address of an object at a particular index in an array of objects (of type `class`). `ldelema`指令加载索引处的值的地址`index`(类型`native int`) 中的从零开始的一维数组`array`并将其放在堆栈顶层。The `ldelema` instruction loads the address of the value at index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 值必须为类型`class`随指令一起传递。The value must be of type `class` passed with the instruction. 返回值`ldelema`是托管的指针 (类型`&`)。The return value for `ldelema` is a managed pointer (type `&`). 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`(不`native int`) 时，它们是加载到计算堆栈上。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于的边界`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldelema`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldelema` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 查找对象中其引用当前位于计算堆栈的字段的值。

span.span: Finds the value of a field in the object whose reference is currently on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7B < `T` >7B < `T` >|ldfld `field`ldfld `field`|推送到堆栈上指定的对象中的字段的值。Pushes the value of a field in a specified object onto the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对象引用 （或指针） 推送到堆栈上。An object reference (or pointer) is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出的对象引用 （或指针）找到的对象中的指定字段值。The object reference (or pointer) is popped from the stack; the value of the specified field in the object is found. 3. 在字段中存储的值推送到堆栈上。The value stored in the field is pushed onto the stack. `ldfld`指令将推送到堆栈的对象中的字段的值。The `ldfld` instruction pushes the value of a field located in an object onto the stack. 该对象必须是在堆栈上为一个对象引用 (类型`O`)，托管的指针 (类型`&`)，非托管的指针 (类型`native int`)，暂时性指针 (类型`*`)，或值类型的实例。The object must be on the stack as an object reference (type `O`), a managed pointer (type `&`), an unmanaged pointer (type `native int`), a transient pointer (type `*`), or an instance of a value type. 中可验证代码不允许使用的非托管指针。The use of an unmanaged pointer is not permitted in verifiable code. 由字段成员必须引用的元数据令牌指定对象的字段。The object's field is specified by a metadata token that must refer to a field member. 返回类型是相同的字段关联的一个。The return type is the same as the one associated with the field. （在这种情况下的对象必须不为空引用） 的实例字段或静态字段，则可能是字段。The field may be either an instance field (in which case the object must not be a null reference) or a static field. `ldfld`指令可以跟一个或两个和前缀。The `ldfld` instruction can be preceded by either or both of the and prefixes. 如果对象为 null，并且该字段不是静态，引发。 is thrown if the object is null and the field is not static. 元数据中找不到指定的字段时引发。 is thrown if the specified field is not found in the metadata. 仅 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令不在运行时转换为本机代码时，通常选中此选项。This is typically checked when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, not at run time. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldfld`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldfld` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

summary.span: 查找对象中其引用当前位于计算堆栈的字段的地址。

span.span: Finds the address of a field in the object whose reference is currently on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7C < `T` >7C < `T` >|ldflda `field`ldflda `field`|地址推送`field`指定对象到堆栈中。Pushes the address of `field` in a specified object onto the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对象引用 （或指针） 推送到堆栈上。An object reference (or pointer) is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出的对象引用 （或指针）找到的对象中的指定字段的地址。The object reference (or pointer) is popped from the stack; the address of the specified field in the object is found. 3. 指定字段的地址推送到堆栈上。The address of the specified field is pushed onto the stack. `ldflda`指令将推送到堆栈的对象中字段的地址。The `ldflda` instruction pushes the address of a field located in an object onto the stack. 该对象必须是在堆栈上为一个对象引用 (类型`O`)，托管的指针 (类型`&`)，非托管的指针 (类型`native int`)，暂时性指针 (类型`*`)，或值类型的实例。The object must be on the stack as an object reference (type `O`), a managed pointer (type `&`), an unmanaged pointer (type `native int`), a transient pointer (type `*`), or an instance of a value type. 中可验证代码不允许使用的非托管指针。The use of an unmanaged pointer is not permitted in verifiable code. 由字段成员必须引用的元数据令牌指定对象的字段。The object's field is specified by a metadata token that must refer to a field member. 返回的值`ldflda`是托管的指针 (类型`&`) 除非对象推送到堆栈上为非托管指针上，在这种情况下的寄信人地址也是非托管的指针 (类型`native int`)。The value returned by `ldflda` is a managed pointer (type `&`) unless the object is pushed onto the stack as an unmanaged pointer, in which case the return address is also an unmanaged pointer (type `native int`). `ldflda`指令可以跟一个或两个和前缀。The `ldflda` instruction can be preceded by either or both of the and prefixes. 如果对象不在正从其中访问它的应用程序域内将引发。 is thrown if the object is not within the application domain from which it is being accessed. 无法加载不在访问应用程序域内的字段的地址。The address of a field that is not inside the accessing application domain cannot be loaded. 如果对象为 null，并且该字段不是静态，引发。 is thrown if the object is null and the field is not static. 元数据中找不到指定的字段时引发。 is thrown if the specified field is not found in the metadata. 仅 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令不在运行时转换为本机代码时，通常选中此选项。This is typically checked when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, not at run time. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldflda`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldflda` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

summary.span: 将指向实现特定方法的本机代码的非托管指针（ 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes an unmanaged pointer (type ) to the native code implementing a specific method onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 06 < `T` >FE 06 < `T` >|ldftn `method`ldftn `method`|推送到所引用方法的指针`method`堆栈上。Pushes a pointer to a method referenced by `method` on the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 指向特定方法的非托管的指针推入堆栈。The unmanaged pointer to a specific method is pushed onto the stack. 特定方法 (`method`) 可以使用调用指令，如果所引用的托管的方法 （或从非托管代码到托管代码转换存根 （stub））。The specific method (`method`) can be called using the instruction if it references a managed method (or a stub that transitions from managed to unmanaged code). 值返回给使用 CLR 调用约定的本机代码的点。The value returned points to native code using the CLR calling convention. 作为回调例程之前，不应将此方法指针传递到非托管的本机代码。This method pointer should not be passed to unmanaged native code as a callback routine. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldftn`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldftn` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)

summary.span: 将 类型的值作为 间接加载到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Loads a value of type as a onto the evaluation stack indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |4D4D|ldind.ildind.i|加载`native int`地址处值`addr`到堆栈上为`native int`。Loads the `native int` value at address `addr` onto the stack as a `native int`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 将地址推送到堆栈上。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出地址提取位于地址处的值。The address is popped from the stack; the value located at the address is fetched. 3. 获取的值推送到堆栈上。The fetched value is pushed onto the stack. `ldind.i`指令间接加载`native int`从指定的地址值 (类型的`native int`， `&`，或 \*) 到堆栈上为`native int`。The `ldind.i` instruction indirectly loads a `native int` value from the specified address (of type `native int`, `&`, or \*) onto the stack as a `native int`. 所有`ldind`了的快捷方式说明指定相应的内置值类的指令。All of the `ldind` instructions are shortcuts for a instruction that specifies the corresponding built-in value class. 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`(不`native int`) 时，它们是加载到计算堆栈上。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 浮点值转换为`F`时加载到计算堆栈上键入。Floating-point values are converted to `F` type when loaded onto the evaluation stack. 格式正确的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 可确保`ldind`使用中与指针的类型一致的方式的说明。Correctly-formed Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) ensures that the `ldind` instructions are used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 最初推入堆栈的地址必须符合的计算机上的对象的自然大小或可以发生 (请参阅前缀预防措施的指令)。The address initially pushed onto the stack must be aligned to the natural size of objects on the machine or a can occur (see the prefix instruction for preventative measures). 寄信人地址的所有 MSIL 指令的结果 (例如，和) 安全地对齐。The results of all MSIL instructions that return addresses (for example, and ) are safely aligned. 对于大于 1 个字节的数据类型，字节排序是依赖于目标 CPU。For datatypes larger than 1 byte, the byte ordering is dependent on the target CPU. 依赖于字节排序的代码可能无法在所有平台上运行。Code that depends on byte ordering might not run on all platforms. 如果检测到了无效的地址，可能会引发。 can be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldind.i`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldind.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将 类型的值作为 间接加载到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Loads a value of type as an onto the evaluation stack indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |4646|ldind.i1ldind.i1|加载`int8`地址处值`addr`到堆栈上为`int32`。Loads the `int8` value at address `addr` onto the stack as an `int32`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 将地址推送到堆栈上。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出地址提取位于地址处的值。The address is popped from the stack; the value located at the address is fetched. 3. 获取的值推送到堆栈中...The fetched value is pushed onto the stack.. `ldind.i1`指令间接加载`int8`从指定的地址值 (类型的`native int`， `&`，或 \*) 到堆栈上为`int32`。The `ldind.i1` instruction indirectly loads an `int8` value from the specified address (of type `native int`, `&`, or \*) onto the stack as an `int32`. 所有`ldind`了的快捷方式说明指定相应的内置值类的指令。All of the `ldind` instructions are shortcuts for a instruction that specifies the corresponding built-in value class. 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`(不`native int`) 时，它们是加载到计算堆栈上。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 浮点值转换为`F`时加载到计算堆栈上键入。Floating-point values are converted to `F` type when loaded onto the evaluation stack. 格式正确的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 可确保`ldind`使用中与指针的类型一致的方式的说明。Correctly-formed Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) ensures that the `ldind` instructions are used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 最初推入堆栈的地址必须符合的计算机上的对象的自然大小或可以发生 (请参阅前缀预防措施的指令)。The address initially pushed onto the stack must be aligned to the natural size of objects on the machine or a can occur (see the prefix instruction for preventative measures). 寄信人地址的所有 MSIL 指令的结果 (例如，和) 安全地对齐。The results of all MSIL instructions that return addresses (for example, and ) are safely aligned. 对于大于 1 个字节的数据类型，字节排序是依赖于目标 CPU。For datatypes larger than 1 byte, the byte ordering is dependent on the target CPU. 依赖于字节排序的代码可能无法在所有平台上运行。Code that depends on byte ordering might not run on all platforms. 如果检测到了无效的地址，可能会引发。 can be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldind.i1`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldind.i1` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Loads a value of type as an onto the evaluation stack indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |4A4A|ldind.i4ldind.i4|加载`int32`地址处值`addr`到堆栈上为`int32`。Loads the `int32` value at address `addr` onto the stack as an `int32`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 将地址推送到堆栈上。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出地址提取位于地址处的值。The address is popped from the stack; the value located at the address is fetched. 3. 获取的值推送到堆栈上。The fetched value is pushed onto the stack. `ldind.i4`指令间接加载`int32`从指定的地址值 (类型的`native int`， `&`，或 \*) 到堆栈上为`int32`。The `ldind.i4` instruction indirectly loads an `int32` value from the specified address (of type `native int`, `&`, or \*) onto the stack as an `int32`. 所有`ldind`了的快捷方式说明指定相应的内置值类的指令。All of the `ldind` instructions are shortcuts for a instruction that specifies the corresponding built-in value class. 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`(不`native int`) 时，它们是加载到计算堆栈上。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 浮点值转换为`F`时加载到计算堆栈上键入。Floating-point values are converted to `F` type when loaded onto the evaluation stack. 格式正确的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 可确保`ldind`使用中与指针的类型一致的方式的说明。Correctly-formed Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) ensures that the `ldind` instructions are used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 最初推入堆栈的地址必须符合的计算机上的对象的自然大小或可以发生 (请参阅前缀预防措施的指令)。The address initially pushed onto the stack must be aligned to the natural size of objects on the machine or a can occur (see the prefix instruction for preventative measures). 寄信人地址的所有 MSIL 指令的结果 (例如，和) 安全地对齐。The results of all MSIL instructions that return addresses (for example, and ) are safely aligned. 对于大于 1 个字节的数据类型，字节排序是依赖于目标 CPU。For datatypes larger than 1 byte, the byte ordering is dependent on the target CPU. 依赖于字节排序的代码可能无法在所有平台上运行。Code that depends on byte ordering might not run on all platforms. 如果检测到了无效的地址，可能会引发。 can be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldind.i4`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldind.i4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Loads a value of type as an onto the evaluation stack indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |4B4B|ldind.u4ldind.u4|加载`unsigned int32`地址处值`addr`到堆栈上为`int32`。Loads the `unsigned int32` value at address `addr` onto the stack as an `int32`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 将地址推送到堆栈上。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出地址提取位于地址处的值。The address is popped from the stack; the value located at the address is fetched. 3. 获取的值推送到堆栈上。The fetched value is pushed onto the stack. `ldind.u4`指令间接加载`unsigned int32`从指定的地址值 (类型的`native int`， `&`，或 \*) 到堆栈上为`int32`。The `ldind.u4` instruction indirectly loads an `unsigned int32` value from the specified address (of type `native int`, `&`, or \*) onto the stack as an `int32`. 所有`ldind`了的快捷方式说明指定相应的内置值类的指令。All of the `ldind` instructions are shortcuts for a instruction that specifies the corresponding built-in value class. 请注意，将小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`(不`native int`) 时，它们是加载到计算堆栈上。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 浮点值转换为`F`时加载到计算堆栈上键入。Floating-point values are converted to `F` type when loaded onto the evaluation stack. 格式正确的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 可确保`ldind`使用中与指针的类型一致的方式的说明。Correctly-formed Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) ensures that the `ldind` instructions are used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 最初推入堆栈的地址必须符合的计算机上的对象的自然大小或可以发生 (请参阅前缀预防措施的指令)。The address initially pushed onto the stack must be aligned to the natural size of objects on the machine or a can occur (see the prefix instruction for preventative measures). 寄信人地址的所有 MSIL 指令的结果 (例如，和) 安全地对齐。The results of all MSIL instructions that return addresses (for example, and ) are safely aligned. 对于大于 1 个字节的数据类型，字节排序是依赖于目标 CPU。For datatypes larger than 1 byte, the byte ordering is dependent on the target CPU. 依赖于字节排序的代码可能无法在所有平台上运行。Code that depends on byte ordering might not run on all platforms. 如果检测到了无效的地址，可能会引发。 can be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldind.u4`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldind.u4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
