summary.span: 将从零开始的、一维数组的元素的数目推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes the number of elements of a zero-based, one-dimensional array onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8E8E|ldlenldlen|推送长度 (类型的`natural unsigned int`) 的数组在堆栈上。Pushes the length (of type `natural unsigned int`) of an array on the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对数组的对象引用推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出数组引用和计算长度。The array reference is popped from the stack and the length is computed. 3. 长度推入堆栈。The length is pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 长度返回为`natural unsigned int`。The length is returned as a `natural unsigned int`. 数组引用为 null 引用时引发。 is thrown if the array reference is a null reference. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldlen`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldlen` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将指定索引处的局部变量加载到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Loads the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0C < `unsigned int16` >FE 0C < `unsigned int16` >|ldloc `index`ldloc `index`|将索引处的局部变量加载`index`到堆栈上。Loads the local variable at index `index` onto stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 指定索引处的局部变量值推送到堆栈上。The local variable value at the specified index is pushed onto the stack. `ldloc`指令将本地的可变数量的内容推送到计算堆栈上传递的索引处的本地变量的开始编号为 0。The `ldloc` instruction pushes the contents of the local variable number at the passed index onto the evaluation stack, where the local variables are numbered 0 onwards. 仅当该方法中的初始化标志为 true，则输入方法之前，本地变量初始化为 0。Local variables are initialized to 0 before entering the method only if the initialize flag on the method is true. 有 65,535 (2 ^16-1） 本地变量可能 (0-65534)。There are 65,535 (2^16-1) local variables possible (0-65,534). 索引 65,535 无效，因为实现很可能将使用的 2 字节整数来跟踪这两个局部变量的索引，以及给定方法的局部变量的总数目。Index 65,535 is not valid since likely implementations will use a 2-byte integer to track both a local's index, along with the total number of locals for a given method. 如果已经使 65535 索引有效，它将要求要跟踪此类方法中的局部变量的数目更宽的整数。If an index of 65535 had been made valid, it would require a wider integer to track the number of locals in such a method. `ldloc.0`， `ldloc.1`， `ldloc.2`，和`ldloc.3`说明介绍了用于访问的前四个本地变量的有效编码。The `ldloc.0`, `ldloc.1`, `ldloc.2`, and `ldloc.3` instructions provide an efficient encoding for accessing the first four local variables. 值的类型是变量的本地，在方法标头中指定的类型相同。The type of the value is the same as the type of the local variable, which is specified in the method header. 请参阅小于 4 个字节长扩展为类型的分区 I.本地变量`int32`被加载到堆栈时会。See Partition I. Local variables that are smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮点值扩展为其本机的大小 (类型`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldloc`操作码：The following method overloads can use the `ldloc` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder) - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

summary.span: 将索引 0 处的局部变量加载到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Loads the local variable at index 0 onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0606|ldloc.0ldloc.0|将索引 0 处的局部变量加载到计算堆栈上。Loads the local variable at index 0 onto the evaluation stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 在索引 0 处的局部变量值推送到堆栈上。The local variable value at the index 0 is pushed onto the stack. `ldloc.0` 是非常有效的编码为，位于索引 0 处允许到本地变量的访问。`ldloc.0` is an especially efficient encoding for , allowing access to the local variable at index 0. 值的类型是变量的本地，在方法标头中指定的类型相同。The type of the value is the same as the type of the local variable, which is specified in the method header. 小于 4 个字节长的本地变量进行扩展以键入`int32`被加载到堆栈时会。Local variables that are smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮点值扩展为其本机的大小 (类型`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldloc.0`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldloc.0` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |11 < `unsigned int8` >11 < `unsigned int8` >|ldloc.s `index`ldloc.s `index`|将索引处的局部变量加载`index`到堆栈，缩写形式。Loads the local variable at index `index` onto stack, short form.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 指定索引处的局部变量值推送到堆栈上。The local variable value at the specified index is pushed onto the stack. `ldloc.s`指令将本地的可变数量的内容推送到计算堆栈上传递的索引处的本地变量的开始编号为 0。The `ldloc.s` instruction pushes the contents of the local variable number at the passed index onto the evaluation stack, where the local variables are numbered 0 onwards. 如果该方法中的初始化标志为 true，则输入方法之前，本地变量初始化为 0。Local variables are initialized to 0 before entering the method if the initialize flag on the method is true. 有 256 (2 ^8) 中的局部变量可能 (0-255) 的缩写形式，这是更有效的编码比`ldloc`。There are 256 (2^8) local variables possible (0-255) in the short form, which is a more efficient encoding than `ldloc`. 值的类型是变量的本地，在方法标头中指定的类型相同。The type of the value is the same as the type of the local variable, which is specified in the method header. 请参阅小于 4 个字节长扩展为类型的分区 I.本地变量`int32`被加载到堆栈时会。See Partition I. Local variables that are smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮点值扩展为其本机的大小 (类型`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldloc.s`操作码：The following method overloads can use the `ldloc.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder) - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，字节）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)

summary.span: 将位于特定索引处的局部变量的地址加载到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Loads the address of the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE OD < `unsigned int16` >FE OD < `unsigned int16` >|ldloca `index`ldloca `index`|处的局部变量的地址加载`index`到计算堆栈。Loads the address of the local variable at `index` onto the evaluation stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 存储在指定索引处的局部变量的地址推送到堆栈上。The address stored in the local variable at the specified index is pushed onto the stack. `ldloca`指令将本地的可变数量的地址推送到堆栈上，传递的索引处其中本地变量是否为开始编号为 0。The `ldloca` instruction pushes the address of the local variable number at the passed index onto the stack, where local variables are numbered 0 onwards. 推送到堆栈上的值已经正确对齐，用于等指令和。The value pushed on the stack is already aligned correctly for use with instructions like and . 结果是暂时性的指针 (类型`*`)。The result is a transient pointer (type `*`). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldloca`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldloca` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

summary.span: 将空引用（ 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes a null reference (type ) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |1414|ldnullldnull|推送到堆栈为空引用push a null reference onto the stack| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 空对象引用推送到堆栈上。A null object reference is pushed onto the stack. `ldnull` 将 null 引用推送 (类型`O`) 堆栈上。`ldnull` pushes a null reference (type `O`) on the stack. 这用于它们填充了数据之前, 或被拒绝时初始化位置。This is used to initialize locations before they are populated with data, or when they become deprecated. `ldnull` 提供的大小无关的 null 引用。`ldnull` provides a null reference that is size-independent. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldnull`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldnull` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将地址指向的值类型对象复制到计算堆栈的顶部。

span.span: Copies the value type object pointed to by an address to the top of the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |71 < `T` >71 < `T` >|ldobj `class`ldobj `class`|值类型的复制实例`class`到堆栈。Copy instance of value type `class` to the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值类型对象的地址推送到堆栈上。The address of a value type object is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出地址和查找位于该特定地址的实例。The address is popped from the stack and the instance at that particular address is looked up. 3. 存储在该地址的对象的值推送到堆栈上。The value of the object stored at that address is pushed onto the stack. `ldobj`指令用于将作为参数传递值类型。The `ldobj` instruction is used to pass a value type as a parameter. `ldobj`指令将指向的值复制`addrOfValObj`(类型的`&`， `*`，或`native int`) 到堆栈顶部。The `ldobj` instruction copies the value pointed to by `addrOfValObj` (of type `&`, `*`, or `native int`) to the top of the stack. 复制的字节数取决于类的大小 (所指定的`class`参数)。The number of bytes copied depends on the size of the class (as specified by the `class` parameter). `class`参数是元数据标记表示的值类型。The `class` parameter is a metadata token representing the value type. 该操作的`ldobj`指令可更改紧跟其后或前缀指令。The operation of the `ldobj` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果找不到类将引发。 is thrown if class cannot be found. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令将转换为本机代码而不是在运行时，通常是检测到此问题。This is typically detected when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction is converted to native code rather than at runtime. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldobj`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 将静态字段的值推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes the value of a static field onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7E < `T` >7E < `T` >|ldsfld `field`ldsfld `field`|将的值推入`field`堆栈上。Push the value of `field` on the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 特定字段的值推送到堆栈上。The value of the specific field is pushed onto the stack. `ldsfld`指令的静态 （在类的所有实例间共享） 值推送到堆栈上的字段。The `ldsfld` instruction pushes the value of a static (shared among all instances of a class) field on the stack. 与传递的元数据令牌相关联的返回类型是`field`。The return type is that associated with the passed metadata token `field`. `ldsfld`指令可以有前缀。The `ldsfld` instruction can have a prefix. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldsfld`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldsfld` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

summary.span: 将静态字段的地址推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes the address of a static field onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7F < `T` >7F < `T` >|ldsflda `field`ldsflda `field`|地址推送`field`堆栈上Push the address of `field` on the stack| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 特定字段的地址推送到堆栈上。The address of a specific field is pushed onto the stack. `ldsflda`指令静态 （在类的所有实例间共享） 的地址推送到堆栈上的字段。The `ldsflda` instruction pushes the address of a static (shared among all instances of a class) field on the stack. 该地址可表示为瞬态指针 (类型`*`) 如果元数据标记`field`引用来管理其内存的类型。The address may be represented as a transient pointer (type `*`) if the metadata token `field` refers to a type whose memory is managed. 否则，它对应于非托管指针 (类型`native int`)。Otherwise, it corresponds to an unmanaged pointer (type `native int`). 请注意，`field`可以是静态分配的相对虚拟地址 （基址的情况下，其包含的 PE 文件加载到内存中的字段的偏移量） 全局内存是非托管。Note that `field` may be a static global with an assigned relative virtual address (the offset of the field from the base address at which its containing PE file is loaded into memory) where the memory is unmanaged. `ldsflda`指令可以有前缀。The `ldsflda` instruction can have a prefix. 元数据中找不到字段时引发。 is thrown if field is not found in the metadata. 仅当 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码，而非运行时，通常选中此选项。This is typically checked when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, not at runtime. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldsflda`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldsflda` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

summary.span: 推送对元数据中存储的字符串的新对象引用。

span.span: Pushes a new object reference to a string literal stored in the metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |72 < `T` >72 < `T` >|ldstr `mdToken`ldstr `mdToken`|推送的元数据字符串标记的字符串对象`mdToken`。Pushes a string object for the metadata string token `mdToken`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对字符串的对象引用推送到堆栈上。An object reference to a string is pushed onto the stack. `ldstr`指令将一个对象引用 (类型`O`) 到一个新的字符串对象，表示存储的元数据中的特定字符串文本。The `ldstr` instruction pushes an object reference (type `O`) to a new string object representing the specific string literal stored in the metadata. `ldstr`指令分配必需的内存量，并执行将字符串文本转换为字符串格式，在运行时所需的文件中使用的格式从所需的任何格式转换。The `ldstr` instruction allocates the requisite amount of memory and performs any format conversion required to convert the string literal from the form used in the file to the string format required at runtime. 公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 可保证两个结果`ldstr`说明两个具有相同的字符序列的元数据标记引用返回相同的字符串对象 （称为"字符串暂留"的过程）。The Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) guarantees that the result of two `ldstr` instructions referring to two metadata tokens that have the same sequence of characters return precisely the same string object (a process known as "string interning"). 以下方法重载可以使用`ldstr`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldstr` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, string)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, string)

summary.span: 将元数据标记转换为其运行时表示形式，并将其推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation, pushing it onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D0 < `T` >D0 < `T` >|ldtoken `token`ldtoken `token`|将元数据标记转换为其运行时表示形式。Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 传入的令牌转换为`RuntimeHandle`和推送到堆栈上。The passed token is converted to a `RuntimeHandle` and pushed onto the stack. `ldtoken`指令推送`RuntimeHandle`的指定元数据标记。The `ldtoken` instruction pushes a `RuntimeHandle` for the specified metadata token. A`RuntimeHandle`可以是`fieldref/fielddef`、 `methodref/methoddef`，或`typeref/typedef`。A `RuntimeHandle` can be a `fieldref/fielddef`, a `methodref/methoddef`, or a `typeref/typedef`. 推送到堆栈上的值可在调用`Reflection`系统类库中的方法。The value pushed on the stack can be used in calls to `Reflection` methods in the system class library. 对运行时句柄的信息，请参阅以下类： ， ，和。For information on runtime handles, see the following classes: , , and . 以下方法重载可以使用`ldtoken`操作码：The following method overloads can use the `ldtoken` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo) - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo) - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 将指向实现与指定对象关联的特定虚方法的本机代码的非托管指针（ 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes an unmanaged pointer (type ) to the native code implementing a particular virtual method associated with a specified object onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 07 < `T` >FE 07 < `T` >|ldvirtftn `method`ldvirtftn `method`|推送到对象的虚方法的指针`method`堆栈上。Pushes the pointer to an object's virtual method `method` on the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用推送到堆栈上。An object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈并且入口点的地址中弹出的对象引用是对方法 (所指定的元数据标记`method`) 查找。The object reference is popped from the stack and the address of the entry point to the method (as specified by the metadata token `method`) is looked up. 3. 将指针与`method`推送到堆栈上。The pointer to `method` is pushed onto the stack. 生成的非托管的指针推入堆栈由`ldvirtftn`可以使用调用指令指令，如果所引用的托管的方法 （或从非托管代码到托管代码转换存根 （stub））。The resulting unmanaged pointer pushed onto the stack by the `ldvirtftn` instruction can be called using the instruction if it references a managed method (or a stub that transitions from managed to unmanaged code). 非托管的指针指向使用 CLR 调用约定的本机代码。The unmanaged pointer points to native code using the CLR calling convention. 作为回调例程之前，不应将此方法指针传递到非托管的本机代码。This method pointer should not be passed to unmanaged native code as a callback routine. 以下方法重载可以使用`ldvirtftn`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldvirtftn` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)

summary.span: 退出受保护的代码区域，无条件将控制转移到特定目标指令。

span.span: Exits a protected region of code, unconditionally transferring control to a specific target instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DD < `int32` >DD < `int32` >|保留 `target`leave `target`|退出受保护的代码区域。Exits a protected region of code.| 不没有为此指令指定任何堆栈转换行为。There is no stack transition behavior specified for this instruction. `leave`指令无条件将控制转移到特定目标指令，这表示为 4 字节有符号偏移量，从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The `leave` instruction unconditionally transfers control to the specific target instruction, represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. `leave`指令是类似于`br`指令，但它可以用于退出`try`， `filter`，或`catch`块，而普通分支指令仅可在这种块传输内的控制它。The `leave` instruction is similar to the `br` instruction, but it can be used to exit a `try`, `filter`, or `catch` block whereas the ordinary branch instructions can only be used in such a block to transfer control within it. `leave`指令清空计算堆栈，并确保周围适当`finally`块执行。The `leave` instruction empties the evaluation stack and ensures that the appropriate surrounding `finally` blocks are executed. 不能使用`leave`指令退出`finally`块。You cannot use a `leave` instruction to exit a `finally` block. 为了简化在 catch 块以使用有效的方法是异常处理程序的代码生成`leave`指令以将控制权转交给中关联的任何指令`try`块。To ease code generation for exception handlers it is valid from within a catch block to use a `leave` instruction to transfer control to any instruction within the associated `try` block. 如果指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个的这些前缀。If an instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 以下方法重载可以使用`leave`操作码：The following method overloads can use the `leave` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit (标签中的操作码）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

summary.span: 退出受保护的代码区域，无条件将控制转移到目标指令（缩写形式）。

span.span: Exits a protected region of code, unconditionally transferring control to a target instruction (short form).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DE < `int8` >DE < `int8` >|leave.s `target`leave.s `target`|退出受保护的代码，短窗体区域。Exit a protected region of code, short form.| 不没有为此指令指定任何堆栈转换行为。There is no stack transition behavior specified for this instruction. `leave.s`指令无条件将控制转移到传递的目标指令，这表示为 1 字节有符号偏移量，从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The `leave.s` instruction unconditionally transfers control to the passed target instruction, represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. `leave.s`指令是类似于`br`指令，但它可以用于退出`try`， `filter`，或`catch`块，而普通分支指令仅可在这种块传输内的控制它。The `leave.s` instruction is similar to the `br` instruction, but it can be used to exit a `try`, `filter`, or `catch` block whereas the ordinary branch instructions can only be used in such a block to transfer control within it. `leave.s`指令清空计算堆栈，并确保周围适当`finally`块执行。The `leave.s` instruction empties the evaluation stack and ensures that the appropriate surrounding `finally` blocks are executed. 不能使用`leave.s`指令退出`finally`块。You cannot use a `leave.s` instruction to exit a `finally` block. 为了简化在 catch 块以使用有效的方法是异常处理程序的代码生成`leave.s`指令以将控制权转交给中关联的任何指令`try`块。To ease code generation for exception handlers it is valid from within a catch block to use a `leave.s` instruction to transfer control to any instruction within the associated `try` block. 如果指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个的这些前缀。If an instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 以下方法重载可以使用`leave.s`操作码：The following method overload can use the `leave.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit (标签中的操作码）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

summary.span: 从本地动态内存池分配特定数目的字节并将第一个分配的字节的地址（瞬态指针， 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Allocates a certain number of bytes from the local dynamic memory pool and pushes the address (a transient pointer, type ) of the first allocated byte onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0FFE 0F|localloclocalloc|从本地堆中分配空间。Allocate space from the local heap.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 要分配的字节数被推送到堆栈上。The number of bytes to be allocated is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出的字节数从本地堆分配的大小相对应的内存量。The number of bytes is popped from the stack; an amount of memory corresponding to the size is allocated from the local heap. 3. 指向分配的内存的第一个字节的指针被推送到堆栈上。A pointer to the first byte of the allocated memory is pushed onto the stack. `localloc`指令分配`size`(类型`natural unsigned int`) 从本地的动态内存的字节池和返回的地址 (暂时性的指针，类型`*`) 的已分配的第一个字节。The `localloc` instruction allocates `size` (type `natural unsigned int`) bytes from the local dynamic memory pool and returns the address (a transient pointer, type `*`) of the first allocated byte. 返回的内存块，将初始化为 0，仅当该方法中的初始化标志为`true`。The block of memory returned is initialized to 0 only if the initialize flag on the method is `true`. 当前方法的执行时，本地内存池将可供重用。When the current method executes a , the local memory pool is made available for reuse. 生成的地址对齐，因此任何基元数据类型可以存储那里使用`stind`说明 (如) 和使用加载`ldind`说明 (如)。The resulting address is aligned so that any primitive data type can be stored there using the `stind` instructions (such as ) and loaded using the `ldind` instructions (such as ). `localloc`指令不能出现在`filter`， `catch`， `finally`，或`fault`块。The `localloc` instruction cannot occur within a `filter`, `catch`, `finally`, or `fault` block. 如果没有足够的内存来为请求提供服务将引发。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to service the request. 以下方法重载可以使用`localloc`操作码：The following method overload can use the `localloc` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将对特定类型实例的类型化引用推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes a typed reference to an instance of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |C6 < `T` >C6 < `T` >|mkrefany `class`mkrefany `class`|将类型的类型化的引用推送`class`到堆栈上。Pushes a typed reference of type `class` onto the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 指向的数据片段的推入堆栈。A pointer to piece of data is pushed onto the stack. 2. 弹出指针并将其转换为类型的类型化引用`class`。The pointer is popped and converted to a typed reference of type `class`. 3. 类型化的引用推送到堆栈上。The typed reference is pushed onto the stack. `mkrefany`指令支持传递的动态类型化的引用。The `mkrefany` instruction supports the passing of dynamically typed references. 指针的类型必须为`&`， `*`，或`native int`，并且保留一段数据的有效地址。The pointer must be of type `&`, `*`, or `native int`, and hold the valid address of a piece of data. `Class` 类令牌描述由指针引用的数据类型。`Class` is the class token describing the type of the data referenced by the pointer. `Mkrefany` 将类型化的引用推送到堆栈上，提供的指针和类型是不透明描述符`class`。`Mkrefany` pushes a typed reference on the stack, providing an opaque descriptor of the pointer and the type `class`. 允许对类型化引用的唯一有效操作是将其传递给需要作为参数的类型化的引用的方法。The only valid operation permitted upon a typed reference is to pass it to a method that requires a typed reference as a parameter. 然后，被调用方可以使用和如何分别检索类型 （类） 和地址。The callee can then use the and instructions to retrieve the type (class) and the address respectively. 如果引发`class`找不到。 is thrown if `class` cannot be found. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码而不是在运行时，通常是检测到此问题。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at runtime. 以下方法重载可以使用`mkrefany`操作码：The following method overload can use the `mkrefany` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 将两个值相乘并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Multiplies two values and pushes the result on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5A5A|mulmul|将在堆栈上的两个值相乘。Multiplies two values on the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`乘以`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `mul`指令乘以`value1`通过`value2`并将结果推送到堆栈上。The `mul` instruction multiplies `value1` by `value2` and pushes the result on the stack. 整数运算以无提示方式截断高位上溢出。Integer operations silently truncate the upper bits on overflow. 请参阅整数特定的乘法运算而不进行溢出处理。See for an integer-specific multiply operation with overflow handling. 对于浮点类型，0 \* 无穷大 = NaN。For floating-point types, 0 \* infinity = NaN. 以下方法重载可以使用`mul`操作码：The following method overload can use the `mul` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将两个整数值相乘，执行溢出检查，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Multiplies two integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D8D8|mul.ovfmul.ovf|溢出检查的堆栈上的两个整数值相乘。Multiplies two integer values on the stack with an overflow check.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`乘以`value2`，并且执行溢出检查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`, with an overflow check. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `mul.ovf`指令乘以整数`value1`通过整数`value2`并将结果推送到堆栈上。The `mul.ovf` instruction multiplies integer `value1` by integer `value2` and pushes the result on the stack. 如果结果不符合结果类型中，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the result will not fit in the result type. 如果不可以结果类型中表示的结果，引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 以下方法重载可以使用`mul.ovf`操作码：The following method overload can use the `mul.ovf` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将两个无符号整数值相乘，执行溢出检查，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Multiplies two unsigned integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D9D9|mul.ovf.unmul.ovf.un|溢出检查的堆栈上的两个无符号的值相乘。Multiplies two unsigned values on the stack with an overflow check.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`乘以`value2`，并且执行溢出检查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`, with an overflow check. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `mul.ovf.un`指令乘以无符号的整数`value1`由无符号整数`value2`并将结果推送到堆栈上。The `mul.ovf.un` instruction multiplies unsigned integer `value1` by unsigned integer `value2` and pushes the result on the stack. 如果结果不符合结果类型中，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the result will not fit in the result type. 如果不可以结果类型中表示的结果，引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 以下方法重载可以使用`mul.ovf.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `mul.ovf.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 对一个值执行求反并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Negates a value and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6565|negneg|当前位于堆栈顶部的值求反。Negates the value currently on top of the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 值为从堆栈中弹出并求反。A value is popped from the stack and negated. 3. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `neg`指令值求反并将推送位于堆栈顶部的结果。The `neg` instruction negates value and pushes the result on top of the stack. 返回类型是操作数类型相同。The return type is the same as the operand type. 求反运算的整数值是标准 2 的补数求反。Negation of integral values is standard two's complement negation. 具体而言，从而取消最小的负号 （它不具有正的副本） 会产生最小的负号。In particular, negating the most negative number (which does not have a positive counterpart) yields the most negative number. 若要检测此溢出，请改用指令改为 （0，即减）。To detect this overflow use the instruction instead (that is, subtract from 0). 从而取消浮点数不能溢出，并从而取消 NaN 返回 NaN。Negating a floating-point number cannot overflow, and negating NaN returns NaN. 以下方法重载可以使用`neg`操作码：The following method overload can use the `neg` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将对新的从零开始的一维数组（其元素属于特定类型）的对象引用推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes an object reference to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8D < `T` >8D < `T` >|newarr `etype`newarr `etype`|创建一个新数组类型的元素`etype`。Creates a new array with elements of type `etype`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 数组中元素的数目推送到堆栈上。The number of elements in the array is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出的元素数，并在创建数组。The number of elements is popped from the stack and the array is created. 3. 对新数组的对象引用推送到堆栈上。An object reference to the new array is pushed onto the stack. `newarr`指令将一个对象引用 (类型`O`) 到新的从零开始、 一维数组，将其元素是类型的`etype`（描述类型的元数据标记）。The `newarr` instruction pushes an object reference (type `O`) to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of type `etype` (a metadata token describing the type). 新数组中元素的数目应指定为`native int`。The number of elements in the new array should be specified as a `native int`. 有效的数组索引范围是从 0 到减一的元素的最大数目。Valid array indexes range from zero to the maximum number of elements minus one. 数组的元素可以是任何类型，包括值类型。The elements of an array can be any type, including value types. 使用引用相应的值类型的元数据标记创建的数字的对象的从零开始的一维数组 (，依次类推)。Zero-based, one-dimensional arrays of numbers are created using a metadata token referencing the appropriate value type (, and so on). 数组的元素将初始化为适当类型的 0。Elements of the array are initialized to 0 of the appropriate type. 使用创建非从零开始的一维数组和多维数组而非`newarr`。Nonzero-based one-dimensional arrays and multidimensional arrays are created using rather than `newarr`. 更常见的是，使用的方法创建它们.NET Framework 中的类。More commonly, they are created using the methods of the class in the .NET Framework. 如果没有足够的内存来满足该请求将引发。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request. 如果引发`numElems`小于 0。 is thrown if `numElems` is less than 0. 以下方法重载可以使用`newarr`操作码：The following method overload can use the `newarr` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 创建一个值类型的新对象或新实例，并将对象引用（ 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Creates a new object or a new instance of a value type, pushing an object reference (type ) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |73 < `T` >73 < `T` >|newobj `ctor`newobj `ctor`|分配未初始化的对象或值类型和调用构造函数方法`ctor`。Allocates an uninitialized object or value type and calls the constructor method `ctor`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 自变量`arg1`通过`argn`序列中推送到堆栈上。Arguments `arg1` through `argn` are pushed on the stack in sequence. 2. 自变量`argn`通过`arg1`从堆栈中弹出并传递到`ctor`创建对象。Arguments `argn` through `arg1` are popped from the stack and passed to `ctor` for object creation. 3. 对新对象的引用推送到堆栈上。A reference to the new object is pushed onto the stack. `newobj`指令会创建一个新的对象或值类型的新实例。The `newobj` instruction creates a new object or a new instance of a value type. `Ctor` 为元数据标记 (`methodref`或`methoddef`，必须将标记为一个构造函数)，该值指示名称、 类和要调用的构造函数的签名。`Ctor` is a metadata token (a `methodref` or `methoddef` that must be marked as a constructor) that indicates the name, class and signature of the constructor to call. `newobj`指令分配与关联的类的新实例`ctor`并初始化为 0 （的正确的类型中） 或与相应的 null 引用的新实例中的所有字段。The `newobj` instruction allocates a new instance of the class associated with `ctor` and initializes all the fields in the new instance to 0 (of the proper type) or null references as appropriate. 然后，它调用构造函数`ctor`与给定的参数以及新创建的实例。It then calls the constructor `ctor` with the given arguments along with the newly created instance. 调用的构造函数后，将新初始化的对象引用 (类型`O`) 推送到堆栈上。After the constructor has been called, the now initialized object reference (type `O`) is pushed on the stack. 在构造函数的角度来看，未初始化的对象是参数 0，然后传递给 newobj 的其他参数按顺序。From the constructor's point of view, the uninitialized object is argument 0 and the other arguments passed to newobj follow in order. 使用创建所有从零开始的一维数组，而不`newobj`。All zero-based, one-dimensional arrays are created using , not `newobj`. 另一方面，使用创建 （更多维度，或是一维但不是从零开始） 的所有其他数组`newobj`。On the other hand, all other arrays (more than one dimension, or one-dimensional but not zero-based) are created using `newobj`. 值类型通常不创建使用`newobj`。Value types are not usually created using `newobj`. 它们通常分配作为参数或局部变量，使用`newarr`（适用于从零开始的一维数组），或作为对象的字段。They are usually allocated either as arguments or local variables, using `newarr` (for zero-based, one-dimensional arrays), or as fields of objects. 分配后，它们将初始化使用。Once allocated, they are initialized using . 但是，`newobj`指令可以用于创建在堆栈中，然后可以作为参数，存储在本地，并因此在传递的值类型的新实例。However, the `newobj` instruction can be used to create a new instance of a value type on the stack, that can then be passed as an argument, stored in a local, and so on. 如果没有足够的内存来满足该请求将引发。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request. 如果构造函数方法将引发`ctor`具有指示的名称，类和签名找不到。 is thrown if a constructor method `ctor` with the indicated name, class and signature could not be found. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时，通常是检测到此问题。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime. 以下方法重载可以使用`newobj`操作码：The following method overload can use the `newobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，ConstructorInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, ConstructorInfo)

summary.span: 尽管可能消耗处理周期，但未执行任何有意义的操作。

span.span: No meaningful operation is performed although a processing cycle can be consumed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0000|nopnop|执行操作而无需行为。Performs an operation without behavior.| 不没有为此指令定义任何堆栈过渡行为。There is no stack transitional behavior defined for this instruction. `nop`操作不执行任何操作。The `nop` operation does nothing. 它旨在如果修补操作码，则填充空间。It is intended to fill in space if opcodes are patched. 以下方法重载可以使用`nop`操作码：The following method overload can use the `nop` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 计算堆栈顶部整数值的按位求补并将结果作为相同的类型推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Computes the bitwise complement of the integer value on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack as the same type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6666|notnot|计算一个值的按位求补。Computes the bitwise complement of a value.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出从堆栈并且其按位求补计算。`value` is popped from the stack and its bitwise complement computed. 3. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `not`指令计算整数值的按位求补并将推送到堆栈的结果。The `not` instruction computes the bitwise complement of an integer value and pushes the result onto the stack. 返回类型是操作数类型相同。The return type is the same as the operand type. 以下方法重载可以使用`not`操作码：The following method overload can use the `not` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 计算位于堆栈顶部的两个整数值的按位求补并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Compute the bitwise complement of the two integer values on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6060|或or|计算的按位或两个整数值，返回一个整数。Computes the bitwise OR of two integer values, returns an integer.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈并且其按位 OR 弹出计算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and their bitwise OR computed. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `or`指令计算位于堆栈顶部的两个值的按位或推送到堆栈的结果。The `or` instruction computes the bitwise OR of two values atop the stack, pushing the result onto the stack. `Or` 是一个整数特定操作。`Or` is an integer-specific operation. 以下方法重载可以使用`or`操作码：The following method overload can use the `or` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 移除当前位于计算堆栈顶部的值。

span.span: Removes the value currently on top of the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2626|poppop|弹出从堆栈顶部的值。Pops the top value from the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 从堆栈中弹出位于顶部的值。The top value is popped from the stack. `pop`指令从堆栈中移除顶部的元素。The `pop` instruction removes the top element from the stack. 以下方法重载可以使用`pop`操作码：The following method overload can use the `pop` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 指定后面的数组地址操作在运行时不执行类型检查，并且返回可变性受限的托管指针。

span.span: Specifies that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer whose mutability is restricted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1EFE 1E|readonly。readonly.|指定，后面的数组地址操作不执行类型检查在运行时，并且，它返回可变性受限的托管的指针。Specify that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer with restricted mutability.| 此前缀只能出现前面紧邻`ldelema`指令和对这两个特殊调用`Address`在阵列上的方法。This prefix can only appear immediately preceding the `ldelema` instruction and calls to the special `Address` method on arrays. 它对后续操作的影响是双重的：Its effect on the subsequent operation is twofold: 1. 在运行时，会不执行任何类型检查操作。At run time, no type check operation is performed. 请注意是通常隐式类型检查`ldelema`和`stelem`指令时使用引用类型数组。Note that there is normally an implicit type check for the `ldelema` and `stelem` instructions when used on reference type arrays. 会永远不会运行时类型检查对于值类，因此`readonly`在这种情况下是不执行任何操作。There is never a run-time type check for value classes, so `readonly` is a no-op in that case. 2. 可变性受限还原时，验证程序将视为托管指针的地址的操作的结果。The verifier treats the result of the address-of operation as a managed pointer with restricted mutability. 指针被认为具有受限的可变性因为定义类型控制是否可以更改值。The pointer is said to have restricted mutability because the defining type controls whether the value can be mutated. 对于公开的任何公共字段或更新的位置中的值的方法的值类，该指针为只读 (因此前缀的名称)。For value classes that expose no public fields or methods that update the value in place, the pointer is read-only (hence the name of the prefix). 具体而言，表示基元类型 (例如，System.Int32) 的类不会公开使用赋值函数，因此是只读的。In particular, the classes representing primitive types (for example, System.Int32) do not expose mutators and thus are read-only. 仅以下方式使用以这种方式受限的托管的指针：A managed pointer restricted in this fashion can be used only in the following ways: - 作为`object`参数`ldfld`， `ldflda`， `stfld`， `call`，或`constrained callvirt`说明。As the `object` parameter for the `ldfld`, `ldflda`, `stfld`, `call`, or`constrained callvirt` instructions. - 作为`pointer`参数`ldobj`指令或其中的某个`ldind`说明。As the `pointer` parameter to the `ldobj` instruction or to one of the `ldind` instructions. - 作为`source`参数`cpobj`指令。As the `source` parameter to the `cpobj` instruction. 所有其他不允许操作，包括`stobj`， `initobj`，或`mkrefany`操作，或任何`stind`说明。All other operations disallowed, including the `stobj`, `initobj`, or `mkrefany` operations, or any of the `stind` instructions. 用途`readonly`前缀是从泛型代码中的数组中提取元素时避免执行类型检查。The purpose of the `readonly` prefix is to avoid a type check when fetching an element from an array in generic code. 例如，表达式`arr[i].m()`，其中的元素类型数组`arr`是被约束为具有方法的接口的泛型类型`m`，可能会编译成如下 MSIL。For example, the expression `arr[i].m()`, where the element type of the array `arr` is a generic type that has been constrained to have an interface with method `m`, might compile to the following MSIL. ``` ldloc arr ldloc i readonly. ldelema !0 // Loads the pointer to the object. … // Load the arguments to the call. constrained. !0 callvirt m ``` 而无需`readonly`前缀，`ldelema`指令将在这种情况中执行类型检查其中 ！ 0 是引用类型。Without the `readonly` prefix, the `ldelema` instruction would perform a type check in the case where !0 was a reference type. 不只是这种类型检查效率低下，但在语义上不正确。Not only is this type check inefficient, but it is semantically incorrect. 类型检查`ldelema`是完全匹配，即太强。The type check for `ldelema` is an exact match, which is too strong. 如果数组包含类型的子类 ！ 0，上面的代码将失败类型检查。If the array held subclasses of type !0, the code above would fail the type check. 数组元素的地址提取，而不是元素本身，以便获得的句柄`arr[i]`适用于这两值类型和引用类型，并且因此可以传递给`constrained callvirt`指令。The address of the array element is fetched, instead of the element itself, in order to have a handle for `arr[i]` that works for both value types and reference types, and thus can be passed to the `constrained callvirt` instruction. 一般情况下，它将不安全，以跳过运行时检查，如果数组包含引用类型的元素。In general it would be unsafe to skip the run-time check if the array held elements of a reference type. 为安全起见，务必确保对数组做任何修改都通过此指针。To be safe, it is necessary to ensure that no modifications to the array are made through this pointer. 验证规则确保这一点。The verifier rules ensure this. 可以作为实例方法调用的对象传递受限的托管的指针，因此它不是严格地说只读的值类型，但是没有值类型的类型安全问题。The restricted managed pointer can be passed as the object of instance method calls, so it is not strictly speaking read-only for value types, but there is no type safety problem for value types. 以下方法重载可以使用`readonly`操作码：The following method overload can use the `readonly` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 检索嵌入在类型化引用内的类型标记。

span.span: Retrieves the type token embedded in a typed reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1DFE 1D|refanytyperefanytype|推送存储在类型化的引用的类型标记。Pushes the type token stored in a typed reference.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值类型引用推送到堆栈上。A value type reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出类型化的引用，其相应的类型标记检索。The typed reference is popped from the stack and its corresponding type token retrieved. 3. 类型标记被推送到堆栈上。The type token is pushed onto the stack. 类型化的引用包含类型标记和对象实例的地址。A typed reference contains a type token and an address to an object instance. `refanytype`指令检索嵌入在类型化引用内的类型标记。The `refanytype` instruction retrieves the type token embedded in the typed reference. 请参阅指令有关创建类型化引用。See the instruction for information on creating typed references. 以下方法重载可以使用`refanytype`操作码：The following method overload can use the `refanytype` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Refanyval As OpCode
public: static initonly System::Reflection::Emit::OpCode Refanyval;

summary.span: 检索嵌入在类型化引用内的地址（ 类型）。

span.span: Retrieves the address (type ) embedded in a typed reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |C2 < `T` >C2 < `T` >|refanyval `type`refanyval `type`|地址存储在类型化引用推送。Pushes the address stored in a typed reference.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值类型引用推送到堆栈上。A value type reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出类型化的引用和检索相应的地址。The typed reference is popped from the stack and the corresponding address retrieved. 3. 地址推送到堆栈中。The address is pushed onto the stack. 类型化的引用包含类型标记和对象实例的地址。A typed reference contains a type token and an address to an object instance. `refanyval`指令检索嵌入在的地址类型化的引用。The `refanyval` instruction retrieves the address embedded in the a typed reference. 嵌入在堆栈上提供的类型化引用的类型必须与由指定的类型匹配`type`(元数据令牌`typedef`或`typeref`)。The type embedded in the typed reference supplied on the stack must match the type specified by `type` (a metadata token, either a `typedef` or a `typeref`). 请参阅相关内容的指令。See the instruction for related content. 如果引发`type`并不到存储中的类型引用的类型完全相同 (在这种情况下，`type`类提供给构造的指令上述类型化的引用)。 is thrown if `type` is not identical to the type stored in the type reference (in this case, `type` is the class supplied to the instruction that constructed said typed reference). 如果引发`type`找不到。 is thrown if `type` cannot be found. 以下方法重载可以使用`refanyval`操作码：The following method overload can use the `refanyval` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 将两个值相除并将余数推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Divides two values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5D5D|remrem|相除的余数推送`value1`通过`value2`到堆栈上。Pushes the remainder of dividing `value1` by `value2` onto the stack.| > [!NOTE] > ReplaceThisTextReplaceThisText 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. A`value1`推送到堆栈上。A `value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈并且的其余部分弹出`value1` `div` `value2`计算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and the remainder of `value1` `div` `value2` computed. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `result` = `value1` `rem` `value2` 满足以下条件：`result` = `value1` `rem` `value2` satisfies the following conditions: `result` = `value1` - `value2` `×` (`value1` `div` `value2`)，和：`result` = `value1` - `value2` `×` (`value1` `div` `value2`), and: 0 = | `result` | < | `value2` |，登录 (`result`) = 号 (`value1`)，其中`div`是向零截断的除法指令。0 = | `result` | < | `value2` |, sign(`result`) = sign(`value1`), where `div` is the division instruction that truncates towards zero. 如果`value2`为零或`value1`为的无穷大，则结果为 NaN。If `value2` is zero or `value1` is infinity the result is NaN. 如果`value2`为无穷大，结果是`value1`(求反后的有关`-infinity`)。If `value2` is infinity, the result is `value1` (negated for `-infinity`). 整数运算引发如果`value2`为零。Integral operations throw if `value2` is zero. 请注意，在基于 Intel 的平台上计算时，将引发 (minint `rem` -1)。Note that on the Intel-based platforms an is thrown when computing (minint `rem` -1). 以下方法重载可以使用`rem`操作码：The following method overload can use the `rem` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将两个无符号值相除并将余数推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Divides two unsigned values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5E5E|rem.unrem.un|相除的余数推送无符号`value1`除以无符号`value2`到堆栈上。Pushes the remainder of dividing unsigned `value1` by unsigned `value2` onto the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈并且的其余部分弹出`value1` `div` `value2`计算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and the remainder of `value1` `div` `value2` computed. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `result` = `value1` `rem.un` `value2` 满足以下条件：`result` = `value1` `rem.un` `value2` satisfies the following conditions: `result` = `value1` - `value2` x (`value1` `div.un` `value2`)，和：`result` = `value1` - `value2` x(`value1` `div.un` `value2`), and: 0 = `result` < `value2`，其中`div.un`是无符号的除法指令。0 = `result` < `value2`, where `div.un` is the unsigned division instruction. `rem.un`指令计算`result`并将结果推送到堆栈上。The `rem.un` instruction computes `result` and pushes it on the stack. `Rem.un` 将其自变量视为无符号整数，而会将它们视作有符号的整数。`Rem.un` treats its arguments as unsigned integers, while treats them as signed integers. `Rem.un` 未指定对于浮点数。`Rem.un` is unspecified for floating-point numbers. 整数运算引发如果`value2`为零。Integral operations throw if `value2` is zero. 以下方法重载可以使用`rem.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `rem.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 从当前方法返回，并将返回值（如果存在）从被调用方的计算堆栈推送到调用方的计算堆栈上。

span.span: Returns from the current method, pushing a return value (if present) from the callee's evaluation stack onto the caller's evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2A2A|retret|从方法返回，可能返回一个值。Returns from method, possibly returning a value.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 返回值是从被调用方计算堆栈中弹出。The return value is popped from the callee evaluation stack. 2. 获取在步骤 1 中的返回值推送到调用方计算堆栈上。The return value obtained in step 1 is pushed onto the caller evaluation stack. 如果返回值不存在于被调用方计算堆栈上，则不返回任何值 （被调用方或调用方的方法没有堆栈转换行为）。If the return value is not present on the callee evaluation stack, no value is returned (no stack transition behaviors for either the callee or caller method). 类型的返回值，如果有，当前方法确定要从堆栈顶部和复制到调用当前方法的方法的堆栈中提取值的类型。The type of the return value, if any, of the current method determines the type of value to be fetched from the top of the stack and copied onto the stack of the method that called the current method. 当前方法的计算堆栈必须为空除外要返回的值。The evaluation stack for the current method must be empty except for the value to be returned. `ret`指令不能用于将控制转移出`try`， `filter`， `catch`，或`finally`块。The `ret` instruction cannot be used to transfer control out of a`try`, `filter`, `catch`, or `finally` block. 在`try`或`catch`，使用指令的目标与`ret`是所有封闭异常块的外部的指令。From within a `try` or `catch`, use the instruction with a destination of a `ret` instruction that is outside all enclosing exception blocks. 因为`filter`和`finally`块在逻辑上是异常处理和不在其中嵌入其代码的方法的一部分，正确生成的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令不执行中的返回方法`filter`或`finally`。Because the `filter` and `finally` blocks are logically part of exception handling and not the method in which their code is embedded, correctly generated Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions do not perform a method return from within a `filter` or `finally`. 以下方法重载可以使用`ret`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ret` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 再次引发当前异常。

span.span: Rethrows the current exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1AFE 1A|重新引发rethrow|重新引发当前异常Rethrows the current exception| 为此指令不定义了任何堆栈转换行为。No stack transition behavior is defined for this instruction. `rethrow`指令仅允许的主体内`catch`处理程序。The `rethrow` instruction is only permitted within the body of a `catch` handler. 它将引发此处理程序捕获相同的异常。It throws the same exception that was caught by this handler. 以下方法重载可以使用`rethrow`操作码：The following method overload can use the `rethrow` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

.field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Shl
Public Shared ReadOnly Shl As OpCode
public: static initonly System::Reflection::Emit::OpCode Shl;

summary.span: 将整数值左移（用零填充）指定的位数，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Shifts an integer value to the left (in zeroes) by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6262|shlshl|将左移 （用零移位） 整数。Shifts an integer to the left (shifting in zeros).| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. Bits 要移动的量推入堆栈。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出要移动的比特数和值值是按照指定的位数左移。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted left by the specified number of bits. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shl`指令右移值 (类型`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 指定数目的位向左。The `shl` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) left by the specified number of bits. 比特数是类型的值`int32`或`native int`。The number of bits is a value of type `int32` or `native int`. 返回的值未指定要移动的比特数是否大于或等于提供的值的宽度 （以位为单位）。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shl` 在每个班次最低的位置中插入零位。`Shl` inserts a zero bit in the lowest position on each shift. 以下方法重载可以使用`shl`操作码：The following method overload can use the `shl` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将整数值右移（保留符号）指定的位数，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Shifts an integer value (in sign) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6363|shrshr|将一个整数 （保留符号移位） 右移。Shifts an integer to the right (shifting in sign).| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. Bits 要移动的量推入堆栈。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出要移动的比特数和值值按照指定的位数向右位移。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted right by the specified number of bits. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shr.un`指令右移值 (类型`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 权限，指定比特数。The `shr.un` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) right by the specified number of bits. 比特数是类型的值`int32`或`native int`。The number of bits is a value of type `int32` or `native int`. 返回的值未指定要移动的比特数是否大于或等于提供的值的宽度 （以位为单位）。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shr` 复制在每一移位，保留原始值中的符号的高序位`result`。`Shr` replicates the high order bit on each shift, preserving the sign of the original value in the `result`. 以下方法重载可以使用`shr`操作码：The following method overload can use the `shr` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将无符号整数值右移（用零填充）指定的位数，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Shifts an unsigned integer value (in zeroes) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6464|shr.unshr.un|将整数向右 （并且位移用零填充）。Shifts an integer to the right (shifting in zeroes).| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. Bits 要移动的量推入堆栈。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出要移动的比特数和值值按照指定的位数向右位移。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted right by the specified number of bits. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shr.un`指令右移值 (类型`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 权限，指定比特数。The `shr.un` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) right by the specified number of bits. 比特数是类型的值`int32`，`int64`或`native int`。The number of bits is a value of type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`. 返回的值未指定要移动的比特数是否大于或等于提供的值的宽度 （以位为单位）。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shr.un` 在每个班次的最高位置中插入零位。`Shr.un` inserts a zero bit in the highest position on each shift. 以下方法重载可以使用`shr.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `shr.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将提供的值类型的大小（以字节为单位）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes the size, in bytes, of a supplied value type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1C < `T` >FE 1C < `T` >|sizeof `valType`sizeof `valType`|推送大小，以字节为单位的值类型作为`unsigned int32`。Push the size, in bytes, of a value type as an `unsigned int32`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 提供的值类型的大小 （以字节为单位） (`valType`) 推送到堆栈上。The size (in bytes) of the supplied value type (`valType`) is pushed onto the stack. `valType` 必须是元数据标记 (`typeref`或`typedef`)，它指定值类型、 引用类型或泛型类型参数。`valType` must be a metadata token (a `typeref` or `typedef`) that specifies a value type, reference type, or generic type parameter. 对于引用类型，返回的大小是相应的引用值的大小键入 （32 位系统上为 4 字节），不由引用值引用的对象中存储的数据的大小。For a reference type, the size returned is the size of a reference value of the corresponding type (4 bytes on 32-bit systems), not the size of the data stored in objects referred to by the reference value. 仅在类型或将其定义的方法的主体中，可以使用泛型类型参数。A generic type parameter can be used only in the body of the type or method that defines it. 该类型或方法实例化时，泛型类型参数都替换为值类型或引用类型。When that type or method is instantiated, the generic type parameter is replaced by a value type or reference type. 以下方法重载可以使用`sizeof`操作码：The following method overload can use the `sizeof` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 将位于计算堆栈顶部的值存储到位于指定索引的自变量槽中。

span.span: Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0B < `unsigned int16` >FE 0B < `unsigned int16` >|starg `num`starg `num`|弹出从堆栈顶部的值并将其存储在参数槽`num`。Pops the top value from the stack and stores it in argument slot `num`.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 弹出当前位于堆栈顶部的值并将其放在参数槽`num`。The value currently on top of the stack is popped and placed in argument slot `num`. `starg`指令弹出堆栈中的一个值，并将其放在参数槽`num`。The `starg` instruction pops a value from the stack and places it in argument slot `num`. 值的类型必须匹配在当前方法的签名中指定的参数的类型。The type of the value must match the type of the argument, as specified in the current method's signature. 对于采用变量自变量列表中，过程`starg`指令可以仅用于初始固定自变量，不是那些在签名的变量的一部分。For procedures that take a variable argument list, the `starg` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. 当从堆栈移到自变量转换容纳的整数值小于 4 个字节长的自变量执行存储截断值。Performing a store into arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the argument. 从其原始大小浮点值舍入 (类型`F`) 到与该参数关联的大小。Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument. 以下方法重载可以使用`starg`操作码：The following method overload can use the `starg` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

summary.span: 将位于计算堆栈顶部的值存储在自变量槽中的指定索引处（短格式）。

span.span: Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index, short form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |10 < `unsigned int8` >10 < `unsigned int8` >|starg.s `num`starg.s `num`|弹出从堆栈顶部的值并将其存储在参数槽`num`，缩写形式。Pops the top value from the stack and stores it in argument slot `num`, short form.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 弹出当前位于堆栈顶部的值并将其放在参数槽`num`。The value currently on top of the stack is popped and placed in argument slot `num`. `starg.s`指令弹出堆栈中的一个值，并将其放在参数槽`num`。The `starg.s` instruction pops a value from the stack and places it in argument slot `num`. 值的类型必须匹配在当前方法的签名中指定的参数的类型。The type of the value must match the type of the argument, as specified in the current method's signature. `starg.s`指令提供有效的编码与的前 256 个自变量一起使用。The `starg.s` instruction provides an efficient encoding for use with the first 256 arguments. 对于采用变量自变量列表中，过程`starg.s`指令可以仅用于初始固定自变量，不是那些在签名的变量的一部分。For procedures that take a variable argument list, the `starg.s` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. 当从堆栈移到自变量转换容纳的整数值小于 4 个字节长的自变量执行存储截断值。Performing a store into arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the argument. 从其原始大小浮点值舍入 (类型`F`) 到与该参数关联的大小。Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument. 以下方法重载可以使用`starg.s`操作码：The following method overload can use the `starg.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，字节）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)

summary.span: 用计算堆栈中的值替换给定索引处的数组元素，其类型在指令中指定。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack, whose type is specified in the instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A4 < `T` >A4 < `T` >|stelem `typeTok`stelem `typeTok`|用提供的索引处的数组元素替换的类型的值`typeTok`堆栈上。Replaces the array element at the supplied index with a value of type `typeTok` on the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 到一个数组中的对象引用`array`，推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值， `index`，到中的元素`array`推送到堆栈上。An index value, `index`, to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 指令中指定类型的值推送到堆栈上。A value of the type specified in the instruction is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、 索引和数组引用值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem`指令用一维数组中提供的从零开始索引处的元素的值替换`array`具有值。The `stelem` instruction replaces the value of the element at the supplied zero-based index in the one-dimensional array `array` with the value. 值具有指定标记的类型`typeTok`在指令中。The value has the type specified by the token `typeTok` in the instruction. 数组是对象，并因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects, and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是类型`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于的边界`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下方法重载可以使用`stelem`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 用计算堆栈上的 值替换给定索引处的数组元素。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9B9B|stelem.istelem.i|替换与提供的索引处的数组元素`native int`堆栈上的值。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `native int` value on the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 到一个数组中的对象引用`array`，推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 到中的元素的有效索引`array`推送到堆栈上。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、 索引和数组引用值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.i`指令替换元素的值`index`一维数组中`array`与`native int`值推送到堆栈上。The `stelem.i` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `native int` value pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是类型`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于的边界`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下方法重载可以使用`stelem.i`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9C9C|stelem.i1stelem.i1|替换与提供的索引处的数组元素`int8`堆栈上的值。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `int8` value on the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 到一个数组中的对象引用`array`，推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 到中的元素的有效索引`array`推送到堆栈上。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、 索引和数组引用值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.i1`指令替换元素的值`index`一维数组中`array`与`int8`值推送到堆栈上。The `stelem.i1` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `int8` value pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是类型`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于的边界`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下方法重载可以使用`stelem.i1`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem.i1` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 用计算堆栈上的 值替换给定索引处的数组元素。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9D9D|stelem.i2stelem.i2|替换与提供的索引处的数组元素`int16`堆栈上的值。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `int16` value on the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 到一个数组中的对象引用`array`，推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 到中的元素的有效索引`array`推送到堆栈上。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、 索引和数组引用值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.i2`指令替换元素的值`index`一维数组中`array`与`int16`值推送到堆栈上。The `stelem.i2` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `int16` value pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是类型`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于的边界`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下方法重载可以使用`stelem.i2`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem.i2` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 用计算堆栈上的对象 ref 值（ 类型）替换给定索引处的数组元素。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the object ref value (type ) on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A2A2|stelem.refstelem.ref|替换与提供的索引处的数组元素`ref`值 (类型`O`) 堆栈上。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `ref` value (type `O`) on the stack.| 执行堆栈过渡行为按顺序排列，即：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 到一个数组中的对象引用`array`，推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 到中的元素的有效索引`array`推送到堆栈上。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、 索引和数组引用值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.ref`指令用一维数组中提供的索引处的元素的值替换`array`与`ref`(类型`O`) 值推送到堆栈上。The `stelem.ref` instruction replaces the value of the element at the supplied index in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `ref` (type `O`) value pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是类型`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 请注意，`stelem.ref`隐式强制转换到的元素类型提供的值`array`之前的值分配给数组元素。Note that `stelem.ref` implicitly casts the supplied value to the element type of `array` before assigning the value to the array element. 此转换可能会与此失败，即使对于验证代码。This cast can fail, even for verified code. 因此`stelem.ref`指令可能引发。Thus the `stelem.ref` instruction can throw . 对于不是从零开始的一维数组和多维数组，类提供方法。For one-dimensional arrays that aren't zero-based and for multidimensional arrays, the class provides a method. 如果引发`array`为空引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果引发`index`为负，或者大于的边界`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下方法重载可以使用`stelem.ref`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem.ref` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
